original: Bhk_2.29-2 dakṣiṇya-diṣṭaṃ kṛtamārtvijīnais tad yātudhānaiś cicite prasarpat.

original: Bhk_2.30-2 tataḥ kṣapā'ṭaiḥ pṛthu-piṅgalā'kṣaiḥ khaṃ prāvṛṣeṇyairiva cā''naśe'bdaiḥ.
analyzed: tatas kṣapāṭaiḥ pṛthu piṅgala akṣaiḥ kham prāvṛṣeṇyaiḥ iva ca ānaśa ibdaiḥ

original: Bhk_2.31-2 tān lakṣmaṇaḥ sannata-vāma-jaṅgho jaghāna śuddheṣura-manda-karṣī.
analyzed: tān lakṣmaṇaḥ san nata vāma jaṅghaḥ jaghāna śuddha iṣuḥ amanda karṣī

analyzed: nṛbhyām tau sa bhṛtyau bhūmi vardhnau
vigrahaḥ tava śakreṇa bṛhaspati purodhasā
sārdham kumārasenānyā
śūnyaḥ ca asi iti kaḥ nayaḥ
yadi aham nātha
nā yāsyam vināsā hata bāndhavā

original: Bhk_5.8-2 nā 'jñāsyas tvamidaṃ sarvaṃ pramādyaṃś cāra-dur-balaḥ.
analyzed: nā jñāsyaḥ tvam idam sarvam pramādyan cāra durbalaḥ
kariṣyamāṇam vijñeyam kāryam
kim nu kṛtam paraiḥ

original: Bhk_5.9-2 apakāre kṛte 'pyajño vijigīṣur na vā bhavān.
analyzed: apakāre kṛte pi ajñaḥ vijigīṣuḥ na vā bhavān

original: Bhk_5.10-1 vṛtas tvaṃ pātre-samitaiḥ khaṭvā''rūḍhaḥ pramāda-vān
analyzed: vṛtaḥ tvam pātresamitaiḥ khaṭvārūḍhaḥ pramādavān
pāna śauṇḍaḥ śriyam netā nā tyantīna tvam unmanāḥ
adhvareṣu agni citvatsu soma sutvataḥ āśramān
attum mahā indriyam bhāgam eti duścyavanaḥ dhunā
āmikṣīyam dadhi kṣīram puroḍāśyam tathā auṣadham

original: Bhk_5.12-2 havir haiyaṅgavīnaṃ ca nā'pyupaghnanti rākṣasāḥ
analyzed: haviḥ haiyaṅgavīnam ca na api upaghnanti rākṣasāḥ
yuva jāniḥ dhanuśpāṇiḥ bhūmiṣṭhaḥ kha vicāriṇaḥ
rāmaḥ yajña druhaḥ hanti kāla kalpa śilīmukhaḥ
māṃsāni oṣṭha avalopyāni sādhanīyāni devatāḥ

original: Bhk_5.14-2 aśnanti, rāmād rakṣāṃsi bibhyaśruvate diśaḥ
analyzed: aśnanti rāmāt rakṣāṃsi diśaḥ
kuru buddhim kuśa agriyām anukāmīna tām tyaja

original: Bhk_5.15-2 lakṣmīṃ paramparīṇāṃ tvaṃ putra-pautrīṇa-tāṃ naya.
analyzed: lakṣmīm paramparīṇām tvam putra pautrīṇatām naya

original: Bhk_5.16-1 sahāya-vanta udyuktā bahavo nipuṇāś ca yām
analyzed: sahāyavantaḥ udyuktāḥ bahavaḥ nipuṇāḥ ca yām
śriyam āśāsate
lolām tām hastekṛtya mā śvasīḥ
lakṣmīḥ pum yogam āśaṃsuḥ kulaṭā iva kutūhalāt

original: Bhk_5.17-2 antike 'pi sthitā patyuś chalenā'nyaṃ nirīkṣate.
analyzed: antike sthitā patyuḥ chalena anyam nirīkṣate
yoṣit vṛndārikā tasya dayitā haṃsa gāminī
dūrvā kāṇḍam iva śyāmā nyagrodha parimaṇḍalā
na āsyam paśyati yaḥ tasyāḥ
niṃste dantacchadam na vā
saṃśṛṇoti na ca uktāni
mithyā asau nihita indriyaḥ
sāraḥ saḥ indriyārthānām
yasyā sau tasya nandathuḥ

original: Bhk_5.20-2 talpe kāntā'ntaraiḥ sārdhaṃ manye 'haṃ dhiṅ nimajjathum.
analyzed: talpe kāntā antaraiḥ sārdham manye ham dhik nimajjathum
na tam paśyāmi
yasyāḥ sau bhavet na udejayā mateḥ

original: Bhk_5.21-2 trailokyenā'pi vindas tvaṃ tāṃ krītvā sukṛtī bhava.
analyzed: trailokyena api vindaḥ tvam tām krītvā sukṛtī bhava
na eva indrāṇī
na rudrāṇī
na mānavī na rohiṇī
varuṇānī na
nā gnāyī tasyāḥ sīmantinī samā
pratyūce rākṣasa indraḥ tām āśvasihi
bibheṣi kim
tyaja naktañcari
kṣobham vācāṭe
rāvaṇaḥ hi aham
mām upāsta didṛkṣāvān yāḥ ṭīka vyāhataḥ hariḥ
ājñā lābha unmukhaḥ dūrāt kākṣeṇa na ādara īkṣitaḥ
virugṇa udagra ghārā agnaḥ kuliśaḥ mama vakṣasi

original: Bhk_5.25-2 a-bhinnaṃ śata-dhā ''tmānaṃ manyate balinaṃ balī.
analyzed: abhinnam śatadhā tmānam manyate balinam balī
kṛtvā laṅkā druma ālānam aham airāvatam gajam
bandhane n upayogi tvāt natam tṛṇa vat atyajam
āhopuruṣikām paśya mama
sat ratna kāntibhiḥ

original: Bhk_5.27-2 dhvastā'ndhakāre 'pi pure pūrṇendoḥ sannidhiḥ sadā.
analyzed: dhvasta andhakāre pi pure pūrṇa indoḥ sannidhiḥ sadā

original: Bhk_5.28-1 hṛta-ratnaś cyutodyogo rakṣobhyaḥ kara-do divi
analyzed: hṛta ratnaḥ cyuta udyogaḥ rakṣobhyaḥ kara daḥ divi

original: Bhk_5.28-2 pūtakratāyīmabhyeti sa-trapaḥ kiṃ na gotra-bhit.
analyzed: pūtakratāyīm abhyeti satrapaḥ kim na gotrabhid

original: Bhk_5.29-1 a-tulya-mahasā sārdhaṃ rāmeṇa mama vigrahaḥ
analyzed: atulya mahasā sārdham rāmeṇa mama vigrahaḥ
trapā karas
tathā api eṣa yatiṣye tad vinigrahe

original: Bhk_5.30-1 utpatya khaṃ daśa-grīvo mano-yāyī śitā'stra-bhṛt
analyzed: utpatya kham daśagrīvaḥ manaḥ yāyī śita astra bhṛt
samudra savidha āvāsam mārīcam prati cakrame
sampatya tat sanīḍa isau tam vṛttāntam aṣiṣravat
trasnunā atha śruta arthena tena agādi daśānanaḥ
antardhatsva raghu vyāghrāt tasmāt tvam rākṣasa īśvara

original: Bhk_5.32-2 yo raṇne durupasthāno hasta-rodhaṃ dadhad dhanuḥ,
analyzed: yaḥ durupasthānaḥ hasta rodham dadhat dhanuḥ
bhavantam kārtavīryaḥ yaḥ hīna sandhim acīkarat

original: Bhk_5.33-2 jigāya tasya hantāraṃ sa rāmaḥ sārvalaukikam.
analyzed: jigāya tasya hantāram sa rāmaḥ sārvalaukikam

original: Bhk_5.34-1 yamā''sya-dṛśvarī tasya tāḍakā vetti vikramam.
analyzed: yama āsya dṛśvarī tasya tāḍakā vetti vikramam

original: Bhk_5.34-2 śūraṃ-manyo raṇāc cā'haṃ nirastaḥ siṃha-nardinā.
analyzed: śūraṃmanyoḥ raṇāt ca aham nirastaḥ siṃhanardinā
na tvam tena nvabhāviṣṭhā
nā nu abhāvi tvayā pi asau
anubhūtaḥ mayā ca ā sau
tena ca a nvabhaviṣi aham
adhyaṅ śastrabhṛtām
nyañcaḥ tam prāpya madvidhāḥ

original: Bhk_5.36-2 sa kanyā-śulkamabhanaṅ mithilāyāṃ makhe dhanuḥ
analyzed: sa kanyā śulkam abhanak mithilāyām makhe dhanuḥ
saṃvittaḥ saha yudhvānau tad śaktim khara dūṣaṇau
yajvānaḥ ca sasutvānaḥ
yāna gopīt makheṣu saḥ
sukha jātaḥ surā pītaḥ nṛ jagdhaḥ mālya dhārayaḥ
adhilaṅkam striyaḥ dīvya
mā rabdhā bali vigraham
tam bhītaṃkāram ākruśya rāvaṇaḥ

original: Bhk_5.39-2 “yāta-yāmaṃ vijitavān sa rāmaṃ yadi, kiṃ tataḥ
analyzed: yātayāmam vijitavān sa rāmam yadi kim tatas
aghāni tāḍakā tena lajjā bhaya vibhūṣaṇā
strī jane yadi tat ślāghyam
dhik lokam kṣudra mānasam
yat gehenardinam asau śaraiḥ bhīrum abhāyayat
ku brahmayajñake rāmaḥ bhavantam
pauruṣam na tat
cira kāla uṣitam jīrṇam kīṭa niṣkuṣitam dhanuḥ

original: Bhk_5.42-2 kiṃ citraṃ yadi rāmeṇa bhagnaṃ kṣatriya-kā'ntike.
analyzed: kim citram yadi rāmeṇa bhagnam kṣatriya kāntike
vana tāpasake vīrau vipakṣe galita ādarau

original: Bhk_5.43-2 kiṃ citraṃ yadi sā'vajñau mamratuḥ khara-dūṣaṇau.
analyzed: kim citram yadi sa avajñau mamratuḥ khara dūṣaṇau
tvam ca bhīruḥ su durbuddhe
nityam śaraṇa kāmyasi
guṇān ca apahnuṣe ismākam
stauṣi śatrūn ca naḥ sadā
śīrṣa chedyam atas ham tvā karomi kṣiti vardhanam

original: Bhk_5.45-2 kārayiṣyāmi vā kṛtyaṃ vijighṛkṣur vanaukasau.
analyzed: kārayiṣyāmi vā kṛtyam vijighṛkṣuḥ vanaukasau
tam udyata niṣāta asim pratyuvāca jijīviṣuḥ
mārīcaḥ nunayan trāsāt abhyamitryaḥ bhavāmi te

original: Bhk_5.47-1 harāmi rāma-saumitrī mṛgo bhūtvā mṛga-dyuvau,
analyzed: harāmi rāma saumitrī mṛgaḥ bhūtvā mṛgadyuvau

original: Bhk_5.47-2 udyogamabhyamitrīṇo yatheṣṭaṃ tvaṃ ca saṃ-tanu.“
analyzed: udyogam abhyamitrīṇaḥ yatheṣṭam tvam ca saṃtanu
tatas citrīyamāṇaḥ sau hema ratna mayaḥ mṛgaḥ

original: Bhk_5.48-2 yathāmukhīnaḥ sītāyāḥ pupluve bahu lobhayan.
analyzed: yathāmukhīnaḥ sītāyāḥ pupluve bahu lobhayan
tena ā dudyūṣayat rāmam mṛgeṇa mṛga locanā
maithilī vipula uraskam prāvuvūrṣuḥ mṛga ajinam

original: Bhk_5.50-1 yoga-kṣema-karaṃ kṛtvā sītāyā lakṣmaṇaṃ tataḥ
analyzed: yogakṣema karam kṛtvā sītāyāḥ lakṣmaṇam tatas
mṛgasya ānupadī rāmaḥ jagāma gaja vikramaḥ

original: Bhk_5.51-1 sthāyaṃ sthāyaṃ kvacid yāntaṃ krāntvā krāntvā sthitaṃ kvacit
analyzed: sthāyam sthāyam kvacid yāntam krāntvā krāntvā sthitam kvacid

original: Bhk_5.51-2 vīkṣamāṇo mṛgaṃ rāmaś citra-vṛttiṃ visiṣmiye.
analyzed: vīkṣamāṇaḥ mṛgam rāmaḥ citra vṛttim visiṣmiye

original: Bhk_5.52-1 ciraṃ kliśitvā marmā-vid rāmo vilubhita-plavam
analyzed: ciram kliśitvā marmā vid rāmaḥ vilubhita plavam
śabdāyamānam avyātsīt bhaya dam kṣaṇadā caram
śrutvā visphūrjathu prakhyam ninādam paridevinī

original: Bhk_5.53-2 matvā kaṣṭa-śritaṃ rāmaṃ saumitriṃ gantumaijihat.
analyzed: matvā kaṣṭa śritam rāmam saumitrim gantum aijihat

original: Bhk_5.54-1 “eṣa prāvṛṣi-jā'mbho-da- nādī bhrātā virauti te,
analyzed: eṣa prāvṛṣija ambhoda nādī bhrātā virauti te
jñātā iyam kuru saumitre
bhayāt trāyasva rāghavam
rāma saṃghuṣitam na etat
mṛgasya eva vivañciṣoḥ
rāma svanita saṅkāśaḥ svān
iti avadat sa tām
āpyāna skandha kaṇṭha aṃsam ruṣitam sahitum raṇe

original: Bhk_5.56-2 prorṇuvantaṃ diśo bāṇaiḥ kākutsthaṃ bhīru / kaḥ kṣamaḥ
analyzed: prorṇuvantam diśaḥ bāṇaiḥ kākutstham bhīru kaḥ kṣamaḥ

original: Bhk_5.57-1 dehaṃ bibhnakṣura-strā'gnau mṛgaḥ prāṇair dideviṣan
analyzed: deham bibhnat kṣura stra agnau mṛgaḥ prāṇaiḥ dideviṣan
jyā ghṛṣṭa kaṭhina aṅguṣṭham rāmam āyāt mumūrṣayā

original: Bhk_5.58-1 śatrūn bhīṣayamāṇaṃ taṃ rāmaṃ vismāpayeta kaḥ,
analyzed: śatrūn bhīṣayamāṇam tam rāmam vismāpayeta kaḥ
mā sma bhaiṣīḥ
tvayā dyā eva kṛtārthaḥ drakṣyate patiḥ
yāyāḥ tvam iti kāmaḥ me
gantum utsahase na ca
icchuḥ kāmayitum tvam mām
iti asau jagade tayā

original: Bhk_5.60-1 mṛṣodyaṃ pravadantīṃ tāṃ satya-vadyo raghūttamaḥ
analyzed: mṛṣodyam pravadantīm tām satya vadyaḥ raghūttamaḥ

original: Bhk_5.60-2 niragāt “śatru-hastaṃ tvaṃ yāsyasī“ti śapan vaśī.
analyzed: niragāt śatru hastam tvam yāsyasi iti śapan vaśī
gate tasmin
jalaśuciḥ śuddhadan rāvaṇaḥ śikhī
kṣamālāvān dhārayaḥ mṛd alābunaḥ

original: Bhk_5.62-2 saṃvastrya lākṣike vastre mātrāḥ saṃbhāṇḍya daṇḍa-vān
analyzed: saṃvastrya lākṣike vastre mātrāḥ saṃbhāṇḍya daṇḍavān
adhīyan ātma vid vidyām dhārayan maskari vratam

original: Bhk_5.63-2 vadan bahvaṅguli-sphoṭaṃ bhrū-kṣepaṃ ca vilokayan
analyzed: vadan bahu aṅguli sphoṭam bhrū kṣepam ca vilokayan
saṃdidarśayiṣuḥ sāma nijuhnūṣuḥ kṣapāṭa tām
caṃkramāvān samāgatya sītām ūce īś sukhā bhava

original: Bhk_5.65-2 kāntiṃ kāntyā sadā-tanyā hrepayantī śuci-smitā.
analyzed: kāntim kāntyā sadā tanyā hrepayantī śuci smitā
kā tvam ekākinī bhīru
niranvaya jane vane

original: Bhk_5.66-2 kṣudhyanto 'pyaghasan vyālās tvāma-pālāṃ kathaṃ na vā.
analyzed: kṣudhyantaḥ pi aghasan vyālāḥ tvām apālām katham na vā

original: Bhk_5.67-2 kurvāṇā bhīmamapyetad vadā 'bhyaiḥ kena hetunā.
analyzed: kurvāṇāḥ bhīmam api etat vada kena hetunā

original: Bhk_5.68-1 sukṛtaṃ priya-kārī tvaṃ kaṃ harasyupatiṣṭhase,
analyzed: sukṛtam priya kārī tvam kam harasi upatiṣṭhase

original: Bhk_5.68-2 puṇya-kṛc cāṭu-kāras te kiṅkaraḥ surateṣu kaḥ.
analyzed: puṇya kṛt cāṭu kāraḥ te kiṅkaraḥ surateṣu kaḥ
pariparyudadhe rūpam ā adyu lokāt ca durlabham
bhāvatkam dṛṣṭavatsu etat asmāsu adhi su jīvitam

sat parimala lakṣmīkā nā puṃskā asi iti me matiḥ
mithyā eva śrīḥ śriyaṃmanyā
śrīmat manyo mṛṣā hariḥ

original: Bhk_5.71-2 sākṣāt-kṛtyā'bhimanye'haṃ tvāṃ harantīṃ śriyaṃ śriyaḥ
analyzed: sākṣātkṛtya abhimanya iham tvām harantīm śriyam śriyaḥ
na udakaṇṭhiṣyata tyartham
tvām aikṣiṣyata ced smaraḥ

original: Bhk_5.72-2 khelāyannaniśaṃ nāpi sajūḥ-kṛtya ratiṃ vaset,
analyzed: khelāyan aniśam na api sajūḥkṛtya ratim vaset

original: Bhk_5.73-1 valgūyantīṃ vilokya tvāṃ strī na mantūyatīha kā,
analyzed: valgūyantīm vilokya tvām strī na mantūyati iha kā

original: Bhk_5.73-2 kāntiṃ nā'bhimanāyeta ko vā sthāṇu-samo 'pi te.
analyzed: kāntim na abhimanāyeta kaḥ vā sthāṇu samaḥ pi te
duḥkhāyate janaḥ sarvāh
saḥ eva ekaḥ sukhāyate
yasya utsukāyamānā tvam na
kaḥ paṇḍitāyamānaḥ tvā mā ādāya āmiṣa sannibhām
trasyan vairāyamāṇebhyaḥ śūnyam anvavasat vanam
ojāyamānā tasyāḥ ṛdhyam praṇīya janakātmajā

original: Bhk_5.76-2 uvāca daśamūrdhānaṃ sā''darā gadgadaṃ vacaḥ
analyzed: uvāca daśamūrdhānam sa ādarā gadgadam vacaḥ
mahā kulīnaḥ aikṣvāke vaṃśe dāśarathiḥ mama

original: Bhk_5.77-2 pituḥ priyaṃ-karo bhartā kṣemaṃ-kāras tapasvinām.
analyzed: pituḥ priyaṃkaraḥ bhartā kṣemaṃkāraḥ tapasvinām

original: Bhk_5.78-1 nihantā vaira-kārāṇāṃ satāṃ bahu-karaḥ sadā
analyzed: nihantā vaira kārāṇām satām bahu karaḥ sadā
pāraśvadhika rāmasya śakteḥ anta karaḥ raṇe

original: Bhk_5.79-1 adhvareṣviṣṭināṃ pātā pūrtī karmasu sarvadā
analyzed: adhvareṣu iṣṭinām pātā pūrtī karmasu sarvadā

original: Bhk_5.79-2 pitur niyogād rāja-tvaṃ hitvā yo'bhyāgamad vanam
analyzed: pituḥ niyogāt rāja tvam hitvā vanam
pitatri kroṣṭu juṣṭāni rakṣāṃsi bhaya de vane
yasya bāṇa nikṛttāni śreṇī bhūtāni śerate
dīvyamānam śitān bāṇān asyamānam mahā gadāḥ

original: Bhk_5.81-2 nighnānaṃ śātravān rāmaṃ kathaṃ tvaṃ nā'vagacchasi.
analyzed: nighnānam śātravān rāmam katham tvam na avagacchasi

original: Bhk_5.82-1 bhrātari nyasya yāto māṃ mṛgāvin mṛgayāmasau,
analyzed: bhrātari nyasya yātaḥ mām mṛgāvin mṛgayām asau

original: Bhk_5.82-2 eṣituṃ preṣito yāto mayā tasyā 'nu-jo vanam
analyzed: eṣitum preṣitaḥ yātaḥ mayā tasyāḥ nujaḥ vanam
athā yasyan kaṣāya akṣaḥ syanna sveda kaṇā ulbaṇaḥ
saṃdarṣita antara ākūtaḥ tām avādīt daśānanaḥ
kṛte kāniṣṭhineyasya jyaiṣṭhineyam vivāsitam

original: Bhk_5.84-2 ko nagna-muṣita-prakhyaṃ bahu manyeta rāghavam.
analyzed: kaḥ nagna muṣita prakhyam bahu manyeta rāghavam
rākṣasān baṭu yajñeṣu piṇḍīśūrān nirastavān
yadi asau kūpamāṇḍūki
tava etāvati kaḥ smayaḥ
mad parākrama saṃkṣipta rājya bhoga paricchadaḥ

original: Bhk_5.86-2 yuktaṃ mamaiva kiṃ vaktuṃ daridrāti yathā hariḥ
analyzed: yuktam mama eva kim vaktum yathā hariḥ

original: Bhk_5.87-1 nir-laṅko vimadaḥ svāmī dhanānāṃ hṛta-puṣpakaḥ
analyzed: nirlaṅkaḥ vimadaḥ svāmī dhanānām hṛta puṣpakaḥ
adhyāste ntar giram yasmāt
kaḥ tat nā vā eti kāraṇam

original: Bhk_5.88-1 bhinna-nauka iva dhyāyan mat-to bibhyad yamaḥ svayam
analyzed: bhinna naukaḥ iva dhyāyan mattaḥ bibhyat yamaḥ svayam
kṛṣṇimānam dadhānena mukhena ā ste nirudyatiḥ
samudropatyakā haimī parvatādhityakā purī

original: Bhk_5.89-2 ratna-pārāyaṇaṃ nāmnā laṅketi mama maithili /
analyzed: ratna pārāyaṇam nāmnā laṅkā iti mama maithili

original: Bhk_5.90-1 āvāse sikta-saṃmṛṣṭe gandhais tvaṃ lipta-vāsitā
analyzed: āvāse sikta saṃmṛṣṭe gandhaiḥ tvam lipta vāsitā

original: Bhk_5.90-2 ārpitoru-sugandhi-srak tasyāṃ vasa mayā saha.
analyzed: ā arpita uru sugandhi sraj tasyām vasa mayā saha
saṃgaccha pauṃsni
straiṇam mām yuvānam taruṇī śubhe
rāghavaḥ proṣya pāpīyān
jahīhi tam akiṃcanam
aśnītapibatīyantī prasitā smara karmaṇi
