original: Bhk_11.16-2 tataḥ sakhīva prathitā'nurāgā prābodhayat dyāṃ madhurā'ruṇaśrīḥ
analyzed: tatas sakhī iva prathita anurāgā prābodhayat dyām madhura aruṇa śrīḥ
a vīta tṛṣṇaḥ paraspareṇa kṣaṇāt iva āyāta niśā avasānaḥ

original: Bhk_11.17-2 duḥkhena lokaḥ paravānivā 'gāt samutsukaḥ svapna-niketanebhyaḥ
analyzed: duḥkhena lokaḥ paravān iva ā gāt samutsukaḥ svapna niketanebhyaḥ

original: Bhk_11.18-1 ardhotthitā''liṅgita-sannimagno ruddhaḥ punar yān gamane 'nabhīpsuḥ
analyzed: ardha utthita āliṅgita sannimagnaḥ ruddhaḥ punar yān gamane na bhīpsuḥ

original: Bhk_11.18-2 vyājena niryāya punar nivṛttas tyaktā'nya-kāryaḥ sthita eva kaścit.
analyzed: vyājena niryāya punar nivṛttaḥ tyakta anya kāryaḥ sthitaḥ eva kaścid
tālena saṃpādita sāmya śobham śubha avadhānam svara baddha rāgam

original: Bhk_11.19-2 padair gatā'rthaṃ nṛpa-mandireṣu prātar jagur maṅgala-vat taruṇyaḥ.
analyzed: padaiḥ gata artham nṛpa mandireṣu prātar jaguḥ maṅgala vat taruṇyaḥ

original: Bhk_11.20-1 duruttare paṅka ivā 'ndhakāre magnaṃ jagat santata-raśmi-rajjuḥ
analyzed: duruttare paṅke iva andhakāre magnam jagat santata raśmi rajjuḥ
pranaṣṭa mūrti pravibhāgam udyan pratyujjahāra iva tatas vivasvān

original: Bhk_11.21-1 pītauṣṭha-rāgāṇi hṛtā'ñjanāni bhāsvanti lolairalakair mukhāni
analyzed: pīta oṣṭha rāgāṇi hṛta añjanāni bhāsvanti lolaiḥ alakaiḥ mukhāni

original: Bhk_11.21-2 prātaḥ kṛtā'rthāni yathā virejus tathā na pūrvedyuralaṃkṛtāni.
analyzed: prātar kṛtārthāni yathā virejuḥ tathā na pūrvedyus alaṃkṛtāni
prajāgara ātāmra vilocana antāḥ nirañjana alaktaka patra lekhāḥ

original: Bhk_11.22-2 tulyā ivā ''san parikheda-tanvyo vāsa-cyutāḥ sevita-manmathābhiḥ
analyzed: tulyāḥ iva ā san parikheda tanvyaḥ vāsa cyutāḥ sevita manmathābhiḥ
ābaddha netra añjana paṅka leśaḥ tāmbūla rāgam bahulam dadhānaḥ

original: Bhk_11.23-2 cakāra kānto 'pyadharo 'ṅganānāṃ sahoṣitānāṃ patibhir laghutvam.
analyzed: cakāra kāntaḥ pi adharaḥ ṅganānām saha uṣitānām patibhiḥ laghu tvam

original: Bhk_11.24-1 cakṣūṃṣi kāntānyapi sā'ñjanāni tāmbūla-raktaṃ ca sa-rāgamoṣṭham
analyzed: cakṣūṃṣi kāntāni api sa añjanāni tāmbūla raktam ca sa rāgam oṣṭham

original: Bhk_11.24-2 kurvan sa-vāsaṃ ca su-gandhi vaktraṃ cakre janaḥ kevala-pakṣa-pātam.
analyzed: kurvan sa vāsam ca sugandhi vaktram cakre janaḥ kevala pakṣapātam
kṣataiḥ asaṃcetita danta labdhaiḥ saṃbhoga kāle vagataiḥ prabhāte
a śaṅkatā nyonya kṛtam vyalīkam viyoga bāhyaḥ pi janaḥ
netra iṣubhiḥ saṃyuta pakṣma patraiḥ karṇa anta kṛṣṭaiḥ uru keśa śūlāḥ

original: Bhk_11.26-2 stanoru-cakrās tata-karṇa-pāśāḥ strī-yoddha-mukhyā jayino viceruḥ
analyzed: stana ūru cakrāḥ tata karṇa pāśāḥ strī yoddha mukhyāḥ jayinaḥ viceruḥ

original: Bhk_11.27-1 payo-dharāṃś candana-paṅka-digdhān vāsāṃsi cā 'mṛṣṭa-mṛjāni dṛṣṭvā
analyzed: payodharān candana paṅka digdhān vāsāṃsi ca mṛṣṭa mṛjāni dṛṣṭvā

original: Bhk_11.27-2 strīṇāṃ sa-patnyo jahṛṣuḥ prabhāte mandāyamānā'nuśayair manobhiḥ
analyzed: strīṇām sapatnyaḥ jahṛṣuḥ prabhāte mandāyamāna anuśayaiḥ manobhiḥ

original: Bhk_11.28-1 smarā''ture cetasi labdha-janmā rarāja lolo'pi guṇā'pahāryaḥ
analyzed: smara āture cetasi labdha janmā rarāja lolopi guṇa apahāryaḥ
kutūhalāt netra gavākṣa saṃsthaḥ paśyan iva nyonya mukhāni rāgaḥ

original: Bhk_11.29-1 gate 'tibhūmiṃ praṇaye prayuktā- na-buddhi-pūrvaṃ pariluptasaṃjñaḥ
analyzed: gate ti bhūmim praṇaye prayuktāḥ na buddhi pūrvam parilupta saṃjñaḥ

original: Bhk_11.29-2 ātmā'nubhūtānapi nopacārān smarā''turaḥ saṃsmarati sma lokaḥ
analyzed: ātma anubhūtān api na upacārān smara āturaḥ saṃsmarati sma lokaḥ
vastraiḥ anatyulbaṇa ramya varṇaiḥ vilepanaiḥ saurabha lakṣmaṇīyaiḥ

original: Bhk_11.30-2 āsyaiś ca lokaḥ paritoṣa-kāntai- rasūcayal labdha-padaṃ rahasyam.
analyzed: āsyaiḥ ca lokaḥ paritoṣa kāntaiḥ rasūcayat labdha padam rahasyam

original: Bhk_11.31-1 prātastarāṃ candana-lipta-gātrāḥ pracchādya hastairadharān vadantaḥ
analyzed: prātastarām candana lipta gātrāḥ pracchādya hastaiḥ adharān vadantaḥ

original: Bhk_11.31-2 śāmyan-nimeṣāḥ sutarāṃ yuvānaḥ prakāśayanti sma nigūhanīyam.
analyzed: śāmyat nimeṣāḥ sutarām yuvānaḥ prakāśayanti sma nigūhanīyam
sāmnā eva loke vijite vāme
kim udyatam bhrū dhanuḥ prasahyam

original: Bhk_11.32-2 hantuṃ kṣamo vā vada locaneṣur digdho viṣeṇeva kimañjanena.
analyzed: hantum kṣamaḥ vā vada locana iṣuḥ digdhaḥ viṣeṇa iva kim añjanena
dantacchade prajvalita agni kalpe tāmbūla rāgaḥ tṛṇa bhāra tulyaḥ

original: Bhk_11.33-2 nyastaḥ kimityūcurupeta-bhāvā goṣṭhīṣu nārīs taruṇīr yuvānaḥ.
analyzed: nyastaḥ kim iti ūcuḥ upeta bhāvāḥ goṣṭhīṣu nārīḥ taruṇīḥ yuvānaḥ

original: Bhk_11.34-1 sukhā'vagāhāni yutāni lakṣmyā śucīni saṃtāpa-harāṇyurūṇi
analyzed: sukha avagāhāni yutāni lakṣmyā śucīni saṃtāpa harāṇi urūṇi

original: Bhk_11.34-2 prabuddha-nārī-mukha-paṅka-jāni prātaḥ sarāṃsīva gṛhāṇi rejuḥ.
analyzed: prabuddha nārī mukha paṅkajāni prātar sarāṃsi iva gṛhāṇi rejuḥ
saṃmṛṣṭa sikta arcita cāru puṣpaiḥ rāmodavat dravya su gandha bhāgaiḥ

original: Bhk_11.35-2 lakṣmīr vijigye bhavanaiḥ sa-bhṛṅgaiḥ sevyasya devairapi nandanasya.
analyzed: lakṣmīḥ vijigye bhavanaiḥ sa bhṛṅgaiḥ sevyasya devaiḥ api nandanasya

original: Bhk_11.36-1 akṣṇoḥ patan nīla-saro-ja-lobhād bhṛṅgaḥ kareṇā 'lpa-dhiyā nirastaḥ
analyzed: akṣṇoḥ patan nīla saroja lobhāt bhṛṅgaḥ kareṇa alpa dhiyā nirastaḥ

original: Bhk_11.36-2 dadaṃśa tāmrā'mbu-ruhā'bhisandhis trṇā''turaḥ pāṇi-tale 'pi dhṛṣṇuḥ.
analyzed: dadaṃśa tāmra amburuha abhisandhiḥ trṇa āturaḥ pāṇi tale pi dhṛṣṇuḥ

original: Bhk_11.37-1 vilola-tāṃ cakṣuṣi hasta-vepathuṃ bhruvor vibhaṅgaṃ stana-yugma-valgitam
analyzed: vilola tām cakṣuṣi hasta vepathum bhruvoḥ vibhaṅgam stana yugma valgitam

original: Bhk_11.37-2 vibhūṣaṇānāṃ kvaṇitaṃ ca ṣaṭ-pado gurur yathā nṛtya-vidhau samādadhe.
analyzed: vibhūṣaṇānām kvaṇitam ca ṣaṭpadaḥ guruḥ yathā nṛtya vidhau samādadhe

original: Bhk_11.38-1 athā 'nukūlān kula-dharma-saṃpado vidhāya veśān su-divaḥ purī-janaḥ.
analyzed: athā nukūlān kula dharma saṃpadaḥ vidhāya veśān su divaḥ purī janaḥ

original: Bhk_11.38-2 prabodha-kāle śāta-manyu-vidviṣaḥ pracakrame rāja-niketanaṃ prati.
analyzed: prabodha kāle śātamanyu vidviṣaḥ pracakrame rāja niketanam prati

original: Bhk_11.39-1 śailendra-śṛṅgebhya iva pravṛttā vegāj jalaughāḥ pura-mandirebhyaḥ
analyzed: śailendra śṛṅgebhyaḥ iva pravṛttāḥ vegāt jala oghāḥ pura mandirebhyaḥ

original: Bhk_11.39-2 āpūrya rathyāḥ sarito janaughā rājā'ṅganā'mbhodhimapūrayanta.
analyzed: āpūrya rathyāḥ saritaḥ jana oghāḥ rāja aṅganā ambhodhim apūrayanta
prabodha kālāt tridaśa indra śatroḥ prāc ūrdhva śoṣam pariśuṣyamāṇāḥ

original: Bhk_11.40-2 hīnā mahāntaś ca sama-tvamīyur dvāsa-sthairavajñā-puruṣā'kṣi-dṛṣtāḥ.
analyzed: hīnāḥ mahāntaḥ ca sama tvam īyuḥ
guru ūru cañcat kara karṇa jihvaiḥ rava jñayā gra aṅguli saṃgṛhītaiḥ
kapola līna ali kulaiḥ gaja indraiḥ
nikṛtta matta dvipa kumbha māṃsaiḥ saṃpṛkta muktaiḥ harayā ugra pādaiḥ

original: Bhk_11.42-2 āninyire śreṇikṛtās tathā 'nyaiḥ parasparaṃ vāladhi-sannibaddhāḥ
analyzed: āninyire śreṇikṛtāḥ tathā nyaiḥ parasparam vāladhi sannibaddhāḥ

original: Bhk_11.43-1 upekṣitā deva-gaṇais trasadbhir niṣā-carair vīta-bhayair nikṛttāḥ
analyzed: upekṣitāḥ deva gaṇaiḥ trasadbhiḥ niṣācaraiḥ vīta bhayaiḥ nikṛttāḥ
tasmin adṛśyanta suradrumāṇām sa jāla puṣpa stabakāḥ prakīrṇāḥ
nirākariṣṇuḥ dvija kuñjarāṇām tṛṇīkṛta aśeṣa guṇa ūti mohāt
pāpa āśayān abhyudaya artham ārcīt prāk brahmarakṣaḥ pravarān daśa āsyaḥ
māyāvibhiḥ trāsa karaiḥ janānā māptaiḥ upādāna paraiḥ upetaḥ
satām vighāta eka rasaiḥ avikṣat sadaḥ parikṣobhita bhūmi bhāgam

original: Bhk_11.46-1 vighṛta-niśita-śastrais tad yutaṃ yātudhānai- ruru-jaṭhara-mukhībhiḥ saṃkulaṃ rākṣasībhiḥ
analyzed: vighṛta niśita śastraiḥ tat yutam yātudhānaiḥ ruru jaṭhara mukhībhiḥ saṃkulam rākṣasībhiḥ

original: Bhk_11.46-2 śvagaṇi-śata-vikīrṇaṃ vāgurā-van mṛgībhir vanamiva sa-bhayābhir deva-bandībhirāsīt.
analyzed: śva gaṇi śata vikīrṇam vāgurāvat mṛgībhiḥ vanam iva sa bhayābhiḥ deva bandībhiḥ āsīt

original: Bhk_11.47-1 jalada iva taḍitvān prājya-ratna-prabhābhiḥ prati-kakubhamudasyan nisvanaṃ dhīra-mandram
analyzed: jaladaḥ iva taḍitvān prājya ratna prabhābhiḥ pratikakubham udasyan nisvanam dhīra mandram

original: Bhk_11.47-2 śikharamiva sumerorāsanaṃ haimamuccair vividha-maṇi-vicitraṃ pronnataṃ so 'dhyatiṣthat
analyzed: śikharam iva sumeroḥ āsanam haimam uccais vividha maṇi vicitram pronnatam saḥ dhyatiṣthat

original: Bhk_12.1-1 tato vi-nidraṃ kṛta-devatā'rcaṃ dṛṣṭyaiva citta-praśamaṃ kirantam
analyzed: tatas vinidram kṛta devatā arcam dṛṣṭyā eva citta praśamam kirantam
āviṣkṛta aṅga pratikarma ramyam vibhīṣaṇam vācam uvāca mātā
prabādhamānasya jaganti dhīman
tvam sodarasya ati mada uddhatasya

original: Bhk_12.2-2 ānandano nāka-sadāṃ praśāntiṃ tūrṇaṃ viṣasyā'mṛta-vat kuruṣva.
analyzed: ānandanaḥ nākasadām praśāntim tūrṇam viṣasya amṛta vat kuruṣva
kuryāḥ tathā
yena jahāti sītām viṣāda nīhāra parīta mūrtim

original: Bhk_12.3-2 sthitāṃ kṣitau śānta-śikhā-pratānāṃ tārāmiva trāsa-karīṃ janasya.
analyzed: sthitām kṣitau śānta śikhā pratānām tārām iva trāsa karīm janasya

original: Bhk_12.4-1 yāvan na saṃtrāsita-deva-saṃghaḥ piṇḍo viṣasyeva hareṇa bhīṣmaḥ
analyzed: yāvat na saṃtrāsita deva saṃghaḥ piṇḍaḥ viṣasya iva hareṇa bhīṣmaḥ
saṃgrasyate sau puruṣādhipena
drutam kula ānanda
yatasva tāvat
hatāḥ janasthāna sadaḥ nikāyāḥ
kṛtā jita utkhāta bhaṭa drumā pūḥ
sadāṃsi dagdhāni
vidheyam asmin yat bandhunā
tat ghaṭayasva tasmin
cikīrṣite pūrvataram sa tasmin
kṣemaṃkare rthe muhur īryamāṇaḥ

original: Bhk_12.6-2 mātrā 'timātraṃ śubhayaiva buddhyā ciraṃ sudhīrabhyadhikaṃ samādhāt.
analyzed: mātrā timātram śubhayā eva buddhyā ciram sudhīḥ abhyadhikam samādhāt
dauvārika abhyāhata śakra dūtam sa upāyana upasthita lokapālam
dvāram yayau rāvaṇa mandriḥ asya

original: Bhk_12.8-1 dūrāt pratīhāra-nataḥ sa vārtāṃ pṛcchannanāvedita-saṃpraviṣṭaḥ
analyzed: dūrāt pratīhāra nataḥ sa vārtām pṛcchan an āvedita saṃpraviṣṭaḥ

original: Bhk_12.8-2 sa-gauravaṃ datta-patho niśāṭai- raikṣiṣṭa śailā'gramivendraśatrum
analyzed: sa gauravam datta pathaḥ niśāṭaiḥ raikṣiṣṭa śaila agram iva indra śatrum
kṛśānu varṣmaṇi adhirūḍham uccais siṃhāsane saṃkṣaya megha bhīmam
nisarga tīkṣṇam nayana sphuliṅgam yugānta vahneḥ iva dhūmarāśim

original: Bhk_12.10-1 prītyā 'pi dattekṣaṇa-sannipātaṃ bhayaṃ bhūjaṅgā'dhipa-vad dadhānam
analyzed: prītyā pi datta īkṣaṇa sannipātam bhayam bhūjaṅga adhipa vat dadhānam
tamaḥ samūha ākṛtim api aśeṣāḥ nu ūrjā jayantam prathita prakāśān

original: Bhk_12.11-1 taṃ ratna-dāyaṃ jita-mṛtyu-lokā rātriṃ-carāḥ kānti-bhṛto 'nvasarpan
analyzed: tam ratna dāyam jita mṛtyu lokāḥ rātriṃcarāḥ kānti bhṛtaḥ nu asarpan
pramukta muktāphalam ambuvāham saṃjāta tṛṣṇāḥ iva deva mukhyāḥ

original: Bhk_12.12-1 sa kiṅkaraiḥ kalpitamiṅgita-jñaiḥ saṃbādhakaṃ pūrva-samāgatānām
analyzed: sa kiṅkaraiḥ kalpitam iṅgita jñaiḥ saṃbādhakam pūrva samāgatānām
siṃhāsana upāśrita cāru bāhu radhyā āsta pīṭham vihita praṇāmaḥ
tatas daśa āsyaḥ kṣubhita ahi kalpam dīpra aṅgulīya upala mūḍha ratnam

original: Bhk_12.13-2 aneka-cañcan-nakha-kānti-jihvaṃ prasārya pāṇiṃ samitiṃ babhāṣe
analyzed: aneka cañcat nakha kānti jihvam prasārya pāṇim samitim babhāṣe

original: Bhk_12.14-1 “śaktaiḥ suhṛdbhiḥ paridṛṣṭa-kāryai- rāmnātibhir nītiṣu buddhi-madbhiḥ
analyzed: śaktaiḥ suhṛdbhiḥ paridṛṣṭa kāryaiḥ rāmnātibhiḥ nītiṣu buddhimadbhiḥ

original: Bhk_12.14-2 yuṣmad-vidhaiḥ sārdhamupāya-vidbhiḥ sadhyanti kāryāṇi su-mantritāni.
analyzed: yuṣmadvidhaiḥ sārdham upāya vidbhiḥ kāryāṇi su mantritāni
upekṣite vāli khara ādi nāśe
dagdhe pure
kṣe nihate sa bhṛtye

original: Bhk_12.15-2 sainye dviṣāṃ sāgaramuttitīrṣā- va-nantaraṃ brūta,
analyzed: sainye dviṣām sāgaram uttitīrṣā vanantaram brūta
yat atra yuktam

original: Bhk_12.16-1 bhujāṃ'sa-vakṣaḥ-sthala-kārmukā'sīn gadāś ca śūlāni ca yātudhānāḥ
analyzed: bhuja aṃsa vakṣaḥ sthala kārmuka asīn gadāḥ ca śūlāni ca yātudhānāḥ

original: Bhk_12.16-2 parāmṛśantaḥ prathitā'bhimānāḥ procuḥ prahasta-pramukhā daśā''syam.
analyzed: parāmṛśantaḥ prathita abhimānāḥ procuḥ prahasta pramukhāḥ daśāsyam
a khaṇḍyamānam parikhaṇḍya śakram tvam paṇḍitaṃmanyam udīrṇa daṇḍaḥ
nara abhiyogam nṛ bhujām pradhāna
mantra unmukhaḥ kim nayase guru tvam

original: Bhk_12.18-1 niryat-sphuliṅgā''kula-dhūma-rāśiṃ kiṃ brūhi bhūmau pinaṣāma bhānum,
analyzed: niryat sphuliṅga ākula dhūma rāśim kim brūhi bhūmau pinaṣāma bhānum
ā danta niṣpīḍita pītam indum ṣṭhīvāma śuṣka ikṣu latā asthi kalpam

original: Bhk_12.19-1 sa-rāghavaiḥ kiṃ bata vānarais tair yaiḥ prātarāśo 'pi na kasyacin naḥ
analyzed: sa rāghavaiḥ kim bata vānaraiḥ taiḥ yaiḥ prātarāśaḥ na kasyacid naḥ
sa sthāṇu kailāsa dhāra abhidhatsva
kim dyauḥ adhas stu
kṣitiḥ antarīkṣe

original: Bhk_12.20-1 cāpalya-yuktasya hareḥ kṛśānuḥ samedhito vāladhi-bhāk tvadīyaiḥ
analyzed: cāpalya yuktasya hareḥ kṛśānuḥ samedhitaḥ vāladhi bhāj tvadīyaiḥ
śastreṇa vadhyasya galan adhākṣīt rājan
pramādena nijena laṅkām
atha ā ñcita uraskam udīrṇa dṛṣṭiḥ kṛtvā vivakṣā pravaṇam śarīram
vivṛtta pāṇiḥ vihita uttara artham vibhīṣaṇaḥ bhāṣata yātudhānān

original: Bhk_12.22-1 “yuddhāya rājṇā subhṛtair bhavadbhiḥ saṃbhāvanāyāḥ sadṛśaṃ yaduktam,
analyzed: yuddhāya rājṇā su bhṛtaiḥ bhavadbhiḥ saṃbhāvanāyāḥ sadṛśam yat uktam
tat prāṇa paṇyaiḥ vacanīyam eva
prajñā tu mantre dhikṛtā na śauryam

original: Bhk_12.23-1 yac cāpi yatnā-''dṛta-mantra-vṛttir guru-tvamāyāti narā'bhiyogaḥ
analyzed: yat ca api yatna ādṛta mantra vṛttiḥ guru tvam āyāti nara abhiyogaḥ
vaśīkṛta indrasya
kṛta uttaraḥ smin vidhvaṃsita aśeṣa puraḥ hanūmān

original: Bhk_12.24-1 agniḥ pramādena dadāha laṅkāṃ vadhyasya dehe svayamedhitaś cet,
analyzed: agniḥ pramādena dadāha laṅkām vadhyasya dehe svayamedhitaḥ ced

original: Bhk_12.24-2 vimṛśya tad deva-dhiyā 'bhidhatta brahmā'stra-bandho'pi yadi pramādaḥ
analyzed: vimṛśya tat deva dhiyā abhidhatta brahmāstrabandho api yadi pramādaḥ
jaganti ameya adbhuta bhāva bhāñji
jita abhimānāḥ ca janāḥ vicitrāḥ

original: Bhk_12.25-2 kārye tu yatnaṃ kuruta prakṛṣṭaṃ,
analyzed: kārye tu yatnam kuruta prakṛṣṭam
mā nīti garbhān sudhiyaḥ vamandhvam
vṛddhi kṣaya sthāna gatām ajasram vṛttim jigīṣuḥ prasamīkṣamāṇaḥ
ghaṭeta sandhyā ādiṣu yaḥ guṇeṣu
lakṣmīḥ na tam muñcati cañcalā pi
upekṣaṇīyā eva parasya vṛddhiḥ pranaṣṭa nīteḥ ajita indrayasya
mada ādi yuktasya virāga hetuḥ
sa mūla ghātam vinihanti yā nte
jana anurāgeṇa yutaḥ vasādaḥ phala anubandhaḥ sudhiyā
upekṣaṇīyaḥ bhyupagamya saṃdhim kāma ādi ṣaḍvarga jitā dhipena

original: Bhk_12.29-1 yadā vigṛhṇan na ca saṃdadhāno vṛddhiṃ kṣayaṃ cā 'nuguṇaṃ prapaśyet,
analyzed: yadā vigṛhṇan na ca saṃdadhānaḥ vṛddhim kṣayam ca a nuguṇam prapaśyet

original: Bhk_12.29-2 āsīta rājā 'vasara-pratīkṣas tadā prayāsaṃ vitathaṃ na kuryāt.
analyzed: āsīta rājā vasara pratīkṣaḥ tadā prayāsam vitatham na kuryāt

original: Bhk_12.30-1 saṃdhau sthito vā janayet sva-vṛddhiṃ hanyāt paraṃ vopaniṣatprayogaiḥ
analyzed: saṃdhau sthitaḥ vā janayet sva vṛddhim hanyāt param vā upaniṣad prayogaiḥ

original: Bhk_12.30-2 āśrāvayedasya janaṃ parair vā vigrāhya kuryādavahīna-saṃdhim.
analyzed: āśrāvayet asya janam paraiḥ vā vigrāhya kuryāt avahīna saṃdhim

original: Bhk_12.31-1 saṃdarśita-sneha-guṇaḥ sva-śatrūn vidveṣayan maṇḍalamasya bhindyāt
analyzed: saṃdarśita sneha guṇaḥ sva śatrūn vidveṣayan maṇḍalam asya bhindyāt

original: Bhk_12.31-2 ityevamādi pravidhāya saṃdhir vṛddher vidheyo 'dhigamābhyupāyaḥ.
analyzed: iti evamādi pravidhāya saṃdhiḥ vṛddheḥ vidheyaḥ dhigama abhyupāyaḥ
matvā sahiṣṇūn apara upajapyān svakān adhiṣṭhāya jala anta durgān
druma adri durlaṅghya jala apradhṛṣyān vardheta rājā ripu vigraheṇa

original: Bhk_12.33-1 śaknoti yo na dviṣato nihantuṃ,
analyzed: śaknoti yaḥ na dviṣataḥ nihantum
vihanyate nā pi abalaiḥ dviṣadbhiḥ

original: Bhk_12.33-2 sa śvā-varāhaṃ kalahaṃ vidadhyā- dāsīta durgā''di vivardhayaṃś ca.
analyzed: sa śvāvarāham kalaham vidadhyāḥ dāsī ita durga ādi vivardhayan ca

original: Bhk_12.34-1 prayāṇa-mātreṇa pare prasādye varteta yānena kṛtā'bhirakṣaḥ,
analyzed: prayāṇa mātreṇa pare prasādye varteta yānena kṛta abhirakṣaḥ

original: Bhk_12.34-2 a-śaknuvan kartumarer vighātaṃ sva-karma-rakṣāṃ ca paraṃ ṣrayeta.
analyzed: a śaknuvan kartum areḥ vighātam sva karma rakṣām ca param
ekena saṃdhiḥ
kalahaḥ pareṇa kāryaḥ bhitas vā prasamīkṣya vṛddhim

original: Bhk_12.35-2 evaṃ prayuñjīta jigīṣuretā nītīr vijānannahitā''tma-sāram.
analyzed: evam prayuñjīta jigīṣuḥ etāḥ nītīḥ vijānan ahita ātma sāram

original: Bhk_12.36-1 tvayā tu loke janito virāgaḥ,
analyzed: tvayā tu loke janitaḥ virāgaḥ
prakopitam maṇḍalam indra mukhyam
rāme tu rājan
viparītam etat paśyāmi
tena abhyadhikam vipakṣam

original: Bhk_12.37-1 ekena vālī nihataḥ śareṇa suhṛt-tamas te,
analyzed: ekena vālī nihataḥ śareṇa suhṛttamaḥ te
racitaḥ ca rājā
yadā eva sugrīva kapiḥ pareṇa
tadā eva kāryam bhavataḥ vinaṣṭam

original: Bhk_12.38-1 prākāra-mātrā''varaṇaḥ prabhāvaḥ kharā''dibhir yo nihatais tavā'bhūt,
analyzed: prākāra mātra āvaraṇaḥ prabhāvaḥ khara ādibhiḥ yaḥ nihataiḥ tava abhūt
laṅkā pradāha akṣa vadha dru bhaṅgaiḥ klāmyati asau api adhunā timātram
ṣaḍvarga vaśyaḥ parimūḍha bandhu viguṇaiḥ upetaḥ

original: Bhk_12.39-2 mā pāda-yuddhaṃ dvi-radena kārṣīr nama kṣitīndraṃ praṇatopabhogyam.
analyzed: mā pāda yuddham dviradena kārṣīḥ nama kṣitīndram praṇata upabhogyam
rāmaḥ pi dāra āharaṇena taptaḥ
vayam hataiḥ bandhubhiḥ ātma tulyaiḥ

original: Bhk_12.40-2 taptasya taptena yathā ''yaso naḥ saṃdhiḥ pareṇā 'stu,
analyzed: taptasya taptena yathā yasaḥ naḥ saṃdhiḥ pareṇa stu
vimuñca sītām
saṃdhukṣitam maṇḍala caṇḍa vātaiḥ ramarṣa tīkṣṇam kṣitipāla tejaḥ
sāma ambhasā śāntim upaitu rājan
prasīda jīvāma sa bandhu bhṛtyāḥ

original: Bhk_12.42-1 a-pakva-kumbhāviva bhaṅga-bhājau rājanniyātāṃ maraṇaṃ samānau,
analyzed: a pakva kumbhau iva bhaṅga bhājau rājan niyātām maraṇam samānau

original: Bhk_12.42-2 vīrye sthitaḥ kiṃtu kṛtā'nurāgo rāmo bhavaṃś cottama-bhūri-vairī.
analyzed: vīrye sthitaḥ kiṃtu kṛta anurāgaḥ rāmaḥ bhavan ca uttama bhūri vairī

original: Bhk_12.43-1 daṇḍena kośena ca manyase cet prakṛṣṭamātmānamares tathāpi
analyzed: daṇḍena kośena ca manyase ced prakṛṣṭam ātmānam areḥ tathā api

original: Bhk_12.43-2 riktasya pūrṇena vṛthā vināśaḥ pūrṇasya bhaṅge bahu hīyate tu.
analyzed: riktasya pūrṇena vṛthā vināśaḥ pūrṇasya bhaṅge bahu hīyate tu

original: Bhk_12.44-1 kliṣṭā''tma-bhṛtyaḥ parimṛgya-sampan mānī yatetā 'pi sa-saṃśaye 'rthe,
analyzed: kliṣṭa ātma bhṛtyaḥ parimṛgya sampad mānī yatetā pi sa saṃśaye rthe
saṃdeham ārohati yaḥ

original: nūnaṃ ratiṃ tasya karoti na śrīḥ.
analyzed: nūnam ratim tasya karoti na śrīḥ
śakyāni adoṣāṇi mahā phalāni samārabheta upanayan samāptim
karmāṇi rājā vihita anurāgaḥ
viparyaye syāt vitathaḥ prayāsaḥ

original: Bhk_12.46-1 jetuṃ na śakyo nṛ-patiḥ su-nītir doṣaḥ kṣayā''diḥ kalahe dhruvaś, ca
analyzed: jetum na śakyaḥ nṛpatiḥ su nītiḥ doṣaḥ kṣaya ādiḥ kalahe dhruvaḥ ca

original: Bhk_12.46-2 phalaṃ na kiṃcin na śubhā samāptiḥ,
analyzed: phalam na kiṃcid na śubhā samāptiḥ
kṛta anurāgam saṃtyaja rim
tvad mitra nāśo
nija mitra lābhaḥ
sameta sainyaḥ sa ca mitrakṛcchre

original: Bhk_12.47-2 bhogyo vaśaḥ paśya śareṇa śatroḥ prasādhito vāli-vadhe na ko 'rthaḥ
analyzed: bhogyaḥ vaśaḥ paśya śareṇa śatroḥ prasādhitaḥ vāli vadhe na kaḥ rthaḥ

original: Bhk_12.48-1 lobhād bhayād vā 'bhigataḥ kapīndro na rāghavaṃ,
analyzed: lobhāt bhayāt vā bhigataḥ kapi indraḥ na rāghavam
yena bhavet vibhedyaḥ

original: Bhk_12.48-2 sthitaḥ satāṃ vartmani labdha-rājyaḥ prati-priyaṃ so 'bhyagamac cikīrṣuḥ.
analyzed: sthitaḥ satām vartmani labdha rājyaḥ pratipriyam saḥ bhyagamat cikīrṣuḥ
phala āśinaḥ nirjhara kuñja bhājaḥ divya aṅganā anaṅga rasa anabhijñāḥ

original: Bhk_12.49-2 nyag-jātayo ratna-varairalabhyā mukhyāḥ kapīnāmapi nopajapyāḥ.
analyzed: nyagjātayaḥ ratna varaiḥ alabhyāḥ mukhyāḥ kapīnām api nā upajapyāḥ
kṛta abhiṣekaḥ yuvarāja rājye sugrīva rājena sutā viśeṣam

original: Bhk_12.50-2 tārā-vidheyena kathaṃ vikāraṃ tārā-suto yāsyati rākṣasā'rtham.
analyzed: tārā vidheyena katham vikāram tārāsutaḥ yāsyati rākṣasa artham

original: Bhk_12.51-1 paśyāmi rāmādadhikaṃ samaṃ vā nā 'nyaṃ,
analyzed: paśyāmi rāmāt adhikam samam vā
virodhe yam upāśrayema

original: Bhk_12.51-2 dattvā varaṃ sā'nuśayaḥ svayambhū- rindrā''dayaḥ pūrva-taraṃ viruddhāḥ.
analyzed: dattvā varam sa anuśayaḥ svayambhuḥ rindra ādayaḥ pūrvataram viruddhāḥ
durga āśritānām bahunā rājan

original: Bhk_12.52-2 durgoparodhaṃ na ca kurvato 'sti śatroś cireṇā 'pi daśā''sya / hāniḥ
analyzed: durga uparodham na ca kurvataḥ sti śatroḥ cireṇa api daśā asya hāniḥ

original: Bhk_12.53-1 śastraṃ tarūrvī-dharamambu pānaṃ vṛttiḥ phalair,
analyzed: śastram taru urvīdharam ambu pānam vṛttiḥ phalaiḥ
naḥ gaja vāji nāryaḥ
rāṣṭram na paścān
na janobhirakṣyaḥ
kim duḥstham ācakṣva bhavet pareṣām
saṃdhānam eva astu pareṇa tasmān
na anyaḥ asti nirūpyamāṇaḥ

original: Bhk_12.54-2 nūnaṃ vi-saṃdhau tvayi sarvametan neṣyanti nāśaṃ kapayo 'cireṇa.“
analyzed: nūnam visaṃdhau tvayi sarvam etat neṣyanti nāśam kapayaḥ cireṇa

original: Bhk_12.55-1 vibhīṣaṇoktaṃ bahu manyamānaḥ pronnamya dehaṃ pariṇāma-namram
analyzed: vibhīṣaṇa uktam bahu manyamānaḥ pronnamya deham pariṇāma namram
skhalat valiḥ vārddhaka kampra mūrdhā mātāmahaḥ rāvaṇam iti uvāca

original: Bhk_12.56-1 “ekaḥ padātiḥ puruṣo dhanuṣmān yo 'neka-māyāni viyad-gatāni
analyzed: ekaḥ padātiḥ puruṣaḥ dhanuṣmān yaḥ na eka māyāni viyat gatāni
rakṣaḥ sahasrāṇi caturdaśa
kā tatra vaḥ mānuṣa mātra śaṅkā

original: Bhk_12.57-1 brahmarṣibhir nūnamayaṃ sa-devaiḥ saṃtāpitau rātricara-kṣayāya
analyzed: brahmarṣibhiḥ nūnam ayam sa devaiḥ saṃtāpitau rātri cara kṣayāya
nara ākṛtiḥ vānara sainya śālī jagati ajayyaḥ vihitaḥ bhyupāyaḥ
vajra abhighātaiḥ avirugṇa mūrteḥ pheṇaiḥ jalānām asurasya mūrdhnaḥ

original: Bhk_12.58-2 cakāra bhedaṃ mṛdubhir mahendro yathā,
analyzed: cakāra bhedam mṛdubhiḥ mahā indraḥ yathā
tathā etat kim api iti bodhyam
kva strī viṣahyāḥ karajāḥ
kva vakṣaḥ daityasya śaila indra śilā viśālam
saṃpaśyata etat dyusadām su nītam
bibheda taiḥ tat narasiṃha mūrtiḥ

original: Bhk_12.60-1 pramāda-vāṃs tvaṃ kṣata-dharma-vartmā gato munīnāmapi śatru-bhāvam,
analyzed: pramādavān tvam kṣata dharma vartmā gataḥ munīnām api śatru bhāvam

original: Bhk_12.60-2 kulasya śāntiṃ bahu manyase cet kuruṣva rājendra /
analyzed: kulasya śāntim bahu manyase ced kuruṣva rāja indra
vibhīṣaṇa uktam

original: Bhk_12.61-1 ghoṣeṇa tena pratilabdha-saṃjño nidrā''vilā'kṣaḥ ṣruta-kārya-sāraḥ
analyzed: ghoṣeṇa tena pratilabdha saṃjñaḥ nidrā āvila akṣaḥ ṣruta kārya sāraḥ

original: Bhk_12.61-2 sphurad-ghanaḥ sā'mburivā 'ntarīkṣe vākyaṃ tato 'bhāṣata kumbhakarṇaḥ
analyzed: sphurat ghanaḥ sa ambuḥ iva ntarīkṣe vākyam tatas bhāṣata kumbhakarṇaḥ
kriyā samārambha gataḥ
vipad pratīkāra yutā rtha siddhiḥ mantra aṅgam etāni vadanti pañca

original: Bhk_12.63-1 na niścitā'rthaṃ samayaṃ ca deśaṃ kriyā'bhyupāyā''diṣu yo 'tiyāyāt,
analyzed: na niścita artham samayam ca deśam kriyā abhyupāya ādiṣu

original: Bhk_12.63-2 sa prāpnuyān mantra-phalaṃ na mānī kāle vipanne kṣaṇadā-carendra /
analyzed: sa prāpnuyāt mantra phalam na mānī kāle vipanne kṣaṇadā cara indra
auṣṇyam tyajet madhya gataḥ u pi bhānuḥ
śaityam niśāyām athavā himāṃśuḥ

original: Bhk_12.64-2 anartha-mūlaṃ bhuvanā'vamānī manye na mānaṃ piśitāśi-nātha /
analyzed: anartha mūlam bhuvana avamānī manye na mānam piśita āśinā atha

original: Bhk_12.65-1 tathā 'pi vaktuṃ prasabhaṃ yatante yan mad-vidhāḥ siddhimabhīpsavas tvām
analyzed: tathā pi vaktum prasabham yatante yat madvidhāḥ siddhim abhīpsavaḥ tvām

original: Bhk_12.65-2 viloma-ceṣṭaṃ vihitā'vahāsāḥ parair hi tat sneha-mayais tamobhiḥ
analyzed: viloma ceṣṭam vihita avahāsāḥ paraiḥ hi tat sneha mayaiḥ tamobhiḥ
krūrāḥ kriyāḥ
grāmya sukheṣu saṅgaḥ
puṇyasya yaḥ saṃkṣaya hetuḥ uktaḥ

original: Bhk_12.66-2 niṣevito 'sau bhavatā 'timātraṃ phalatya-valgu dhruvameva rājan /
analyzed: niṣevitaḥ sau bhavatā timātram phalati avalgu dhruvam eva rājan
dattam na kim
ke viṣayāḥ na bhuktāḥ
sthitaḥ smi vā kam paribhūya na uccais

original: Bhk_12.67-2 itthaṃ kṛtā'rthasya mama dhruvaṃ syān mutyus tvadarthe yadi,
analyzed: ittham kṛtārthasya mama dhruvam syāt mutyuḥ tvad arthe yadi
kim na labdham

original: Bhk_12.68-1 kiṃ durnayais tvayyuditair mṛṣā'rthair vīryeṇa vaktā 'smi raṇe samādhim.“
analyzed: kim durnayaiḥ tvayi uditaiḥ mṛṣārthaiḥ vīryeṇa vaktā smi raṇe samādhim

original: Bhk_12.68-2 tasmin prasupte punaritthamuktvā vibhīṣaṇo 'bhāṣata rākṣasendram.
analyzed: tasmin prasupte punar ittham uktvā vibhīṣaṇaḥ bhāṣata rākṣasa indram
nimitta śūnyaiḥ sthagitāḥ rajobhiḥ diśaḥ
marudbhiḥ vikṛtaiḥ vilolaiḥ
svabhāva hīnaiḥ mṛga pakṣi ghoṣaiḥ krandanti bhartāram iva a bhipannam

original: Bhk_12.70-1 utpāta-jaṃ chidramasau vivasvān vyādāya vaktrā''kṛti loka-bhīṣmam
analyzed: utpāta jam chidram asau vivasvān vyādāya vaktra ākṛti loka bhīṣmam

original: Bhk_12.70-2 attuṃ janān dhūsara-raśmi-rāśiḥ siṃho yathā kīrṇa-saṭo 'bhyudeti.
analyzed: attum janān dhūsara raśmi rāśiḥ siṃhaḥ yathā kīrṇa saṭaḥ bhyudeti

original: Bhk_12.71-1 mārgaṃ gato gotra-gurur bhṛgūṇā- magastinā 'dhyāsita-vindhya-śṛṅgam,
analyzed: mārgam gataḥ gotra guruḥ bhṛgūṇām magastinā dhyāsita vindhya śṛṅgam
saṃdṛśyate śakra purohitaḥ hni
kṣmām kampayantyaḥ nipatanti ca ulkāḥ

original: Bhk_12.72-1 māṃsaṃ hatānāmiva rākṣasānā- māśaṃsavaḥ krūra-giro ruvantaḥ
analyzed: māṃsam hatānām iva rākṣasānām mā āśaṃsavaḥ krūra giraḥ ruvantaḥ

original: Bhk_12.72-2 kravyā'śino dīpta-kṛśānu-vaktrā bhrāmyantya-bhītāḥ paritaḥ puraṃ naḥ
analyzed: kravya āśinaḥ dīpta kṛśānu vaktrāḥ bhrāmyanti abhītāḥ paritas puram naḥ

original: Bhk_12.73-1 payo ghaṭodhnīrapi gā duhanti mandaṃ vi-varṇaṃ vi-rasaṃ ca gopāḥ,
analyzed: payaḥ ghaṭodhnīḥ api gāḥ duhanti mandam vivarṇam virasam ca gopāḥ

original: Bhk_12.73-2 havyeṣu kīṭopajanaḥ sa-keśo na dīpyate 'gniḥ su-samindhano 'pi.
analyzed: havyeṣu kīṭa upajanaḥ sa keśaḥ na dīpyate gniḥ su samindhanaḥ pi

original: Bhk_12.74-1 tasmāt kuru tvaṃ pratikāramasmin snehān mayā rāvaṇa /
analyzed: tasmāt kuru tvam pratikāram asmin snehāt mayā rāvaṇa
bhāṣyamāṇaḥ

original: Bhk_12.74-2 vadanti duḥkhaṃ hyanujīvi-vṛtte sthitāḥ padasthaṃ pariṇāma-pathyam.
analyzed: vadanti duḥkham hi anujīvi vṛtte sthitāḥ pada stham pariṇāma pathyam
virugṇa saṃkīrṇa vipanna bhinnaiḥ pakṣuṇṇa saṃhrīṇa śita astra vṛkṇaiḥ

original: Bhk_12.75-2 yāvan narā'śair na ripuḥ śava'śān saṃtarpayatyānama tāvadasmai.“
analyzed: yāvat nara āśaiḥ na ripuḥ saṃtarpayati ānama tāvat asmai

original: Bhk_12.76-1 bhrū-bhaṅgamādhāya vihāya dhairyaṃ vibhīṣaṇaṃ bhīṣaṇa-rūkṣa-cakṣuḥ
analyzed: bhrū bhaṅgam ādhāya vihāya dhairyam vibhīṣaṇam bhīṣaṇa rūkṣa cakṣuḥ

original: Bhk_12.76-2 giraṃ jagādogra-padāmudagraḥ svaṃ sphāvayan śakra-ripuḥ prabhāvam.
analyzed: giram jagāda ugra padām udagraḥ svam sphāvayan śakra ripuḥ prabhāvam
śilā tariṣyati udake na parṇam
dhvāntam raveḥ syantsyati
vahniḥ indoḥ

original: Bhk_12.77-2 jetā paro 'haṃ yudhi jeṣyamāṇas tulyāni manyasva pulastya-naptaḥ /
analyzed: jetā paraḥ ham yudhi jeṣyamāṇaḥ tulyāni manyasva pulastya naptar

original: Bhk_12.78-1 a-nirvṛtaṃ bhūtiṣu gūḍha-vairaṃ satkāra-kāle 'pi kṛtā 'bhyasūyam
analyzed: anirvṛtam bhūtiṣu gūḍha vairam satkāra kāle pi kṛtā abhyasūyam

original: Bhk_12.78-2 vibhinna-karmā''śaya-vāk kule no mā jñāti-celaṃ,
analyzed: vibhinna karma āśaya vāc kule naḥ mā jñāti celam
bhuvi kasyacid bhūt

original: Bhk_12.79-1 icchantyabhīkṣṇaṃ kṣayamātmano 'pi na jñātayas tulya-kulasya lakṣmīm
analyzed: icchanti abhīkṣṇam kṣayam ātmanaḥ pi na jñātayaḥ tulya kulasya lakṣmīm
namanti śatrūn

original: na ca bandhu-vṛddhiṃ saṃtapyamānair hṛdayaiḥ sahante.
analyzed: na ca bandhu vṛddhim saṃtapyamānaiḥ hṛdayaiḥ sahante
tvayā adya laṅkā abhibhave ti harṣāt duṣṭaḥ timātram vivṛtaḥ ntarātmā
dhik tvām

original: mṛṣā te mayi dustha-buddhir” vadannidaṃ tasya dadau sa pārṣṇim.
analyzed: mṛṣā te mayi dustha buddhiḥ vadan idam tasya dadau sa pārṣṇim

original: Bhk_12.81-1 tataḥ sa kopaṃ kṣamayā nigrhṇan,
analyzed: tatas sa kopam kṣamayā
dhairyeṇa manyum
vinayena garvam
moham dhiyā utsāha vaśāt aśaktim
samam caturbhiḥ sacivaiḥ udasthāt
uvāca ca enam sukham mahā rāja
vinā mayā ssva
mūrkha āturaḥ pathya kaṭūn an aśnan yat sāmayā asau
bhiṣajām na doṣaḥ
karoti vairam sphuṭam ucyamānaḥ
pratuṣyati śrotra sukhaiḥ apathyaiḥ
viveka śūnyaḥ prabhuḥ ātma mānī
mahān anarthaḥ suhṛdām bata yam

original: Bhk_12.84-1 krīḍan bhujaṅgena gṛhā'nupātaṃ kaścid yathā jīvati saṃśaya-sthaḥ,
analyzed: krīḍan bhujaṅgena gṛha anupātam kaścid yathā jīvati saṃśaya sthaḥ

original: Bhk_12.84-2 saṃsevamāno nṛ-patiṃ pra-mūḍhaṃ tathaiva yaj jīvati,
analyzed: saṃsevamānaḥ nṛpatim pramūḍham tathā eva yat jīvati
saḥ sya lābhaḥ

original: Bhk_12.85-1 dattaḥ sva-doṣair bhavatā prahāraḥ pādena dharmye pathi me sthitasya,
analyzed: dattaḥ sva doṣaiḥ bhavatā prahāraḥ pādena dharmye pathi me sthitasya

original: Bhk_12.85-2 sa cintanīyaḥ saha mantri-mukhyaiḥ kasyā ''vayor lāghavamādadhātu.
analyzed: sa cintanīyaḥ saha mantri mukhyaiḥ kasyāḥ vayoḥ lāghavam ādadhātu

original: Bhk_12.86-1 iti vacanamasau rajani-cara-patiṃ bahu-guṇamasakṛt prasabhamabhidadhat
analyzed: iti vacanam asau rajanicara patim bahu guṇam asakṛt prasabham abhidadhat
niragamat abhayaḥ puruṣa ripu purāt narapati caraṇau navitum ari nutau

original: Bhk_12.87-1 atha tamupagataṃ vidita-sucaritaṃ pavana-suta-girā giri-guru-hṛdayaḥ
analyzed: atha tam upagatam vidita su caritam pavanasuta girā giri guru hṛdayaḥ
nṛpatiḥ amadayat mudita parijanam sva purapati karaiḥ salila samudayaiḥ
cāru samīraṇa ramaṇe hariṇa kalaṅka kiraṇa āvali sa vilāsā
ābaddha rāma mohā velā mūle vibhāvarī parihīṇā

original: Bhk_13.2-1 baddho vāsara-saṅge bhīmo rāmeṇa lavaṇa-salilā''vāse
analyzed: baddhaḥ vāsara saṅge bhīmaḥ rāmeṇa lavaṇa salila āvāse
sahasā saṃrambha rasaḥ dūra ārūḍha ravi maṇḍala samaḥ lole
gāḍha guru puṅkha pīḍā sa dhūma salila ari saṃbhava mahā bāṇe

original: Bhk_13.3-2 āruḍhā saṃdehaṃ rāme sa-mahī-dhāra mahī sa-phaṇi-sabhā.
analyzed: āruḍhā saṃdeham rāme sa mahīdhāra mahī sa phaṇi sabhā
ghora jala danti saṃkula maṭṭa mahā paṅka kāhala jala āvāsam
ārīṇam lavaṇa jalam samiddha phala bāṇa viddhi ghora phaṇi varam
sa bhayam pariharamāṇaḥ mahā ahi saṃcāra bhāsuram salila gaṇam
ārūḍhaḥ lavaṇa jalaḥ jala tīram hari bala āgama vilola guham
cañcala taru hariṇa gaṇam bahu kusuma ābandha baddha rāma āvāsam
hari pallava taru jālam tuṅga ūru samiddha taru vara hima chāyam
vara vāranam salila bhareṇa giri mahī maṇḍala saṃvara vāraṇam
vasu dhāryam tuṅga taraṅga saṅga parihīṇa lola vasudhā rayam
kulakam etāni sapta saṃkīrṇāni

original: Bhk_13.8-1 praṇipatya tato vacanaṃ jagāda hitamāyato patir vārīṇām
analyzed: praṇipatya tatas vacanam jagāda patiḥ vārīṇām
gaṅgā avalambi bāhuḥ rāmam bahala ūru harita māla chāyam
pūrva ardham niravadyam
tuṅgā giri vara dehā
agamam salilam
samīraṇaḥ rasa hārī
ahimaḥ ravi kiraṇa gaṇaḥ
māyā saṃsāra kāraṇam te paramā
āyāsa saṃbhava aruṇa
saṃhara saṃhāra hima hara sama chāyam
bāṇam vāri samūham saṃgaccha purāṇa cāru deha āvāsam
a sulabha hari saṃcāram jala mūlam bahala paṅka ruddha āyāmam

original: Bhk_13.11-2 bhaṇa kiṃ jala-parihīṇaṃ su-gamaṃ timi-kambu-vāri-vāraṇa-bhīmam.
analyzed: bhaṇa kim jala parihīṇam sugamam timi kambu vāri vāraṇa bhīmam
gantum laṅkā tīram baddha mahā salila saṃcareṇa sa helam

original: Bhk_13.12-2 taru-hariṇā giri-jālaṃ vahantu giri-bhāra-saṃsahā guru-deham.
analyzed: taru hariṇāḥ giri jālam vahantu giri bhāra saṃsahāḥ guru deham
hara hāsa ruddha vigamam para kaṇṭha gaṇam mahā āhava samārambhe

original: Bhk_13.13-2 chindantu rāma-bāṇā gambhīre me jale mahā-giri-baddhe.
analyzed: chindantu rāma bāṇāḥ gambhīre me jale mahā giri baddhe
gacchantu cāru hāsāḥ vīra rasā bandha ruddha bhaya saṃbandham

original: Bhk_13.14-2 hantuṃ bahu-bāhu-balaṃ hari-kariṇo giri-varoru-dehaṃ sahasā.
analyzed: hantum bahu bāhu balam hari kariṇaḥ giri vara ūru deham sahasā
etāni ṣaḍ saṃkīrṇāni

original: Bhk_13.15-1 jigamiṣayā saṃyuktā bahūva kapi-vāhinī mate dāśaratheḥ
analyzed: jigamiṣayā saṃyuktā bahūva kapi vāhinī mate dāśaratheḥ
buddha jala ālaya cittā giri haraṇa ārambha saṃbhava samālolā
pūrva ardham niravadyam
ārūḍham sahasā kham varuṇālaya vimala salila gaṇa gambhīram
avagāḍham giri jālam tuṅga mahā bhitti ruddha sura saṃcāram
abhaya hari rāsa bhīmam kari parimala cāru bahala kandara salilam
ali gaṇa vilola kusumam sa kamala jala matta kurara kāraṇḍava gaṇam
phaṇi saṃkula bhīma guham kari danta samūḍha sarasa vasudhā khaṇḍam
aravinda reṇu piñjara sārasa rava hāri vimala bahu cāru jalam
ravi maṇi saṃbhava hima hara samāgama ābaddha bahula sura taru dhūpam
hari rava vilola vāraṇa gambhīra ābaddha sarasa puru saṃrāvam
ghoṇā saṃgama paṅkā vila subala bhara mahā uru varāham
etāni pañca saṃkīrnāni

original: Bhk_13.21-1 uccakhnuḥ parirabdhān kapi-saṅghā bāhubhis tato bhūmi-bhṛtaḥ
analyzed: uccakhnuḥ parirabdhān kapi saṅghāḥ bāhubhiḥ tatas bhūmibhṛtaḥ
niṣpaṣṭa śeṣa mūrdhnaḥ śṛṅga vikīrṇa uṣṇaraśmi nakṣatra gaṇān
sarvam niravadyam
tuṅga mahā giri subharāḥ bāhu samāruddha bhidura ṭaṅkāḥ bahudhā
lavaṇa jalabandha kāmāḥ ārūḍhāḥ ambaram mahā pariṇāham
bahu dhavala vāri vāham vimala āyasa mahā asi deha chāyam
baddha vihaṅgama mālam himagirim iva matta kurara rava saṃbaddham
cāru kalahaṃs saṃkula sa caṇḍa saṃcāra sārasa ābaddha ravam
sa kusuma kaṇa gandhavaham samaya āgama vāri saṅga vimala āyāmam

original: Bhk_13.25-1 sahasā te taru-hariṇā giri-subharā lavaṇa-salila-bandhā''rambhe
analyzed: sahasā te taru hariṇāḥ giri subharāḥ lavaṇa salila bandha ārambhe
tīra girim ārūḍhāḥ rāma āgama ruddha sa bhaya ripu saṃcāram
etāni catvāri saṃkīrṇāni

original: Bhk_13.26-1 tataḥ prāṇītāḥ kapi-yūtha-mukhyair nyastāḥ kṛśānos tanayena samyak
analyzed: tatas prāṇītāḥ kapi yūtha mukhyaiḥ nyastāḥ kṛśānoḥ tanayena samyak
akampra brādhna agra nitamba bhāgāḥ mahā arṇavam bhūmibhṛtaḥ vagāḍhāḥ
nirākhyātam niravadyam ca
tene dribandhyaḥ
vavṛdhe payodhiḥ
tutoṣa rāmaḥ
mumude kapi indraḥ
tatra āsa śatruḥ
dadṛśe suvelaḥ
prāpe jala antaḥ
juhṛṣuḥ plavaṅgāḥ
ekāntara ākhyātam niravadyam ca
bhremuḥ vavalguḥ
nanṛtuḥ
jajakṣuḥ
juguḥ
samutpupluvire niṣeduḥ
āsphoṭayāṃcakruḥ abhipraṇedū
rejuḥ
nananduḥ
viyayuḥ samīyuḥ
ākhyāta mālā
bahu bahala ūru taraṅgam parisara sārūḍham uddharam lavaṇa jalam
lolam kūla abhigame khe tuṅga amala nibaddha puru pariṇāham
sura gaṅgā ābharaṇa saham giri bandha vareṇa lavaṇa salilam ruddham
ārūḍham ca suvelam taru mālā bandha hāri giri vara jālam
rāvaṇa citta bhayaṅkara mā apiṅgala lola kesaram rāma balam
laṅkā ālaya tumula ārava subhara gabhīra uru kuñja kandara vivaram
vīṇā rava rasa saṅgama sura gaṇa saṃkula mahā tamāla chāyam
sa rasa bahu pallava āvila kesara hintāla baddha bahala chāyam
tuṅga taru chāyā ruha komala hari hāri lola pallava jālam
kalahari kaṇṭha virāvam salila mahā bandha saṃkula mahā sālam
cala kisalaya saṃbaddham maṇi jālam salila kaṇa mayam vivahantam
tuṅga maṇi kiraṇa jālam giri jala saṃghaṭṭa baddha gambhīra ravam
cāru guhā vivara sabham sura pura samam amara cāraṇa su saṃrāvam
vīra hari danti saṅgama bhaya ruddha vibhāvarī vihāra samīham
sa mahā phaṇi bhīma bilam bhūri vihaṅgama tumula uru ghora virāvam
vāraṇa varāha hari vara go gaṇa sāraṅga saṃkula mahā sālam
cala kisalaya savilāsam cāru mahī kamala reṇu piñjara vasudham
sa kusuma kesara bāṇam lavaṅga taru taruṇa vallarī vara hāsam
amala maṇi hema ṭaṅkam tuṅga mahā bhitti ruddha ruru paṅka gamam
amara ārūḍha parisara merum iva ā vila sarasa mandāra tarum
phala bhara manthara taru vara ma vidūra virūḍha hāri kusuma āpīḍam
hariṇa kalaṅka maṇi saṃbhava bahu vāri bhara su gambhīra guham
aṅkura toha sama chavi ruru gaṇa saṃlīḍha tarala hari maṇi kiraṇam
gāḍha samīraṇa su saham bhīma rava uttuṅga vāridhara saṃghaṭṭam
dhavala jalavāha mālā saṃbandha ābaddha hima dharādhara līlam
laṅkā toraṇa vāraṇa mā ārūḍham samara lāla saṃrāma balam
ḍhakkā ghaṇṭā tumulam sannaddham para balam raṇa āyāsa saham
ārūḍha bāṇa ghoram vimala āyasa jāla gūḍha pīvara deham
asi tomara kunta mahā paṭṭiśa bhalla vara bāṇa guru puru musalam
vīra rasa alaṅkāram guru saṃcāra haya danti sa mahīkampam

original: Bhk_13.48-1 te rāmeṇa sa-rabhasaṃ paritaralā hari-gaṇā raṇa-samārambhe
analyzed: te rāmeṇa sarabhasam paritaralāḥ hari gaṇāḥ raṇa samārambhe
ruddhā laṅkā parisara bhūdhara paribhaṅga lālasā dhīra ravam
jala tīra tuṅga taru vara kangara giri bhitti kuñja vivara āvāsam
bhīmam taru hariṇa balam su samiddha hima ari kiraṇa mālā lolam
rāvaṇa balam avagantum jala bhara guru salila vāha gaṇa sama chāyam
toraṇa mālā sabhāsu samārūḍham
tatas daśa āsyaḥ smara vihvala ātmā cāra prakāśīkṛta śatru śaktiḥ

original: Bhk_14.1-2 vimohya māyā-maya-rāma-mūrdhnā sītāmanīkaṃ prajighāya yoddhum.
analyzed: vimohya māyā maya rāma mūrdhnā sītām anīkam prajighāya yoddhum
kambūn atha samādadhmuḥ
koṇaiḥ bheryaḥ nijaghnire
veṇūn pupūrire
guñjāḥ juguñjuḥ kara ghaṭṭitāḥ

hayāḥ jiheṣire harṣāt
gambhīram jagajuḥ gajāḥ
saṃtrastāḥ karabhāḥ reṭuḥ
cukuvuḥ patti paṅktayaḥ
turaṅgāḥ apusphuṭuḥ bhītāḥ
pusphuruḥ vṛṣabhāḥ param

original: Bhk_14.6-2 nāryaś cukṣubhire mamlur mumuhuḥ śuśucuḥ patīn.
analyzed: nāryaḥ cukṣubhire mamluḥ mumuhuḥ śuśucuḥ patīn
jagarjuḥ

bhremuḥ cukurdire

original: Bhk_14.10-2 aśvāḥ, pradudruvur mokṣe raktaṃ nijagaruḥ śrame.
analyzed: aśvāḥ pradudruvuḥ mokṣe raktam nijagaruḥ śrame
gajānām pradaduḥ śārīn
kambalān paritas taruḥ
tenuḥ kakṣām
dhvajān ca eva samucchiśriyuḥ ucchikhān
viśiśvāsayiṣāṃcakruḥ āliliṅguḥ ca yoṣitaḥ

original: Bhk_14.12-2 ājaghnur mūrdhni bālāṃś ca cucumbuś ca suta-priyāḥ.
analyzed: ājaghnuḥ mūrdhni bālān ca cucumbuḥ ca suta priyāḥ
gambhīra vedinaḥ saṃjñāḥ gajāḥ jagṛhuḥ akṣatāḥ
vavṛdhe śuśubhe ca eṣām madaḥ
hṛṣṭaiḥ ca pupluve
mṛgāḥ pradakṣiṇam sasruḥ

avāmaiḥ pusphure dehaiḥ
prasede citta vṛttibhiḥ

rāvaṇiḥ ca tirodadhe

saṃtatrasuḥ dviṣaḥ
vibhinnāḥ jughuruḥ ghoram
jakṣuḥ kravya āśinaḥ hatān
cuṣcyā uta vraṇinām raktam
chinnāḥ celuḥ kṣaṇam bhujāḥ

original: Bhk_14.41-1 kṛttairapi dṛḍha-krodho vīra-vaktrair na tatyaje,
analyzed: kṛttaiḥ api dṛḍha krodhaḥ vīra vaktraiḥ na tatyaje
palāyāṃcakrire śeṣā
jihriyuḥ śūra māninaḥ
rāghavaḥ na dayāṃcakre
dadhuḥ dhairyam na kecana

original: Bhk_14.42-2 mamre pataṅgavad vīrair hāheti ca vicukruśe.
analyzed: mamre pataṅga vat vīraiḥ hāhā iti ca vicukruśe
tirobabhūve sūryeṇa
prāpe ca niśayā spadam

original: Bhk_14.43-2 jagrase kāla-rātrīva vānarān rākṣasāmś ca sā.
analyzed: jagrase kālarātriḥ iva vānarān rākṣasān ca sā
cukopa indrajit ati ugram sarpa astram juhāva saḥ

original: Bhk_14.44-2 ājuhuve tirobhūtaḥ parānīkaṃ, jahāsa ca.
analyzed: ājuhuve tirobhūtaḥ para anīkam jahāsa ca
babādhe ca balam kṛtsnam
nijagrāha ca sāyakaiḥ
utsasarja śarān
tesya sarpasāt ca prapedire

original: Bhk_14.46-1 ācicāya sa taiḥ senāmācikāya ca rāghavau,
analyzed: ācicāya sa taiḥ senām ācikāya ca rāghavau
babhāṇa ca
na me māyām jigāya indraḥ upi kim nṛbhiḥ

original: Bhk_14.47-1 ācikyāte ca bhūyo 'pi rāghavau tena pannagaiḥ
analyzed: ācikyāte ca bhūyas rāghavau tena pannagaiḥ
tau mumuhatuḥ udvignau
vasudhāyām ca petatuḥ
tatas rāma iti cakranduḥ
tresuḥ parididevire
niśaśvasuḥ ca senānyaḥ
procuḥ dhik iti ca ātmanaḥ

original: Bhk_14.49-1 manyuṃ śekur na te roddhuṃ,
analyzed: manyum śekuḥ na te roddhum
nā sram saṃrurudhuḥ patat
vividuḥ na indrajit mārgam
parīyuḥ ca plavaṅgamāḥ

original: Bhk_14.50-1 dadhāvā 'dbhis tataś cakṣuḥ sugrīvasya vibhīṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: dadhāva a dbhiḥ tatas cakṣuḥ sugrīvasya vibhīṣaṇaḥ

original: Bhk_14.50-2 vidāṃcakāra dhautā'kṣaḥ sa ripuṃ khe, nanarda ca.
analyzed: vidāṃcakāra dhautākṣaḥ sa ripum khe nanarda ca

original: Bhk_14.51-1 ujjugūre tataḥ śailaṃ hantumindrajitaṃ kapiḥ
analyzed: ujjugūre tatas śailam hantum indrajitam kapiḥ

original: Bhk_14.51-2 vihāya rāvaṇis tasmādānaṃhe cā 'ntikaṃ pituḥ.
analyzed: vihāya rāvaṇiḥ tasmāt ānaṃhe ca a ntikam pituḥ
ācacakṣe ca vṛttāntam
prajaharṣa ca rāvanaḥ
gāḍham ca upajugūha enam
śirasi upaśiśiṅgha ca
dhvajān uddudhuvuḥ tuṅgān
māṃsam cemuḥ
jaguḥ papuḥ
kāmayāṃcakrire kāntāḥ
tatas tuṣṭāḥ niśācarāḥ

original: Bhk_14.54-1 darśayāṃcakrire rāmaṃ sītāṃ rājñaś ca śāsanāt,
analyzed: darśayāṃcakrire rāmam sītām rājñaḥ ca śāsanāt
tasyāḥ mimīlatuḥ netre
luluṭhe puṣpaka udare
prāṇāḥ dadhvaṃsire
gātram tastambhe ca priye hate
ucchaśvāsa cirāt dīnā
ruroda sau rarāsa ca
lauha bandhaiḥ babandhe nu
vajreṇa kim vinirmame

original: Bhk_14.56-2 mano me, na vinā rāmād yat pusphoṭa sahasra-dhā.
analyzed: manaḥ me na vinā rāmāt yat pusphoṭa sahasradhā
utteritha samudram tvam mad arthe
rīn jihiṃsitha

original: Bhk_14.57-2 mamartha cā'tighorāṃ māṃ dhig jīvita-laghūkṛtām.
analyzed: mamartha ca ati ghorām mām dhik jīvita laghūkṛtām

original: Bhk_14.58-1 na jijīvā 'sukhī tātaḥ prāṇatā rahitas tvayā,
analyzed: na jijīvā sukhī tātaḥ prāṇatā rahitaḥ tvayā

original: Bhk_14.58-2 mṛte'pi tvayi jīvantyā kiṃ mayā 'ṇakabhāryayā.“
analyzed: mṛte api tvayi jīvantyā kim mayā ṇaka bhāryayā
sā jugupsān pracakre sūn
jagarhe lakṣaṇāni ca
dehabhāñji
tatas keśān luluñca
luluṭhe muhur
jaglau dadhyau
vitastāna
kṣaṇam prāṇa na vivyathe
daivam nininda
cakranda
dehe ca ā tīva manyunā

original: Bhk_14.61-1 āśvāsayāṃcakārā 'tha trijaṭā tāṃ, nināya ca.
analyzed: āśvāsayāṃcakārā tha trijaṭā tām nināya ca
tatas prajāgarāṃcakruḥ vānarāḥ sa vibhīṣaṇāḥ

original: Bhk_14.62-1 ciceta rāgas tat kṛcchramoṣāṃcakre śucā 'tha saḥ,
analyzed: ciceta rāgaḥ tat kṛcchram oṣāṃcakre śucā tha saḥ
manyuḥ ca sya samāpipye
virurāva ca lakṣmaṇam

original: Bhk_14.63-1 samīhe martumānarce tena vācā 'khilaṃ balam,
analyzed: samīhe martum ānarce tena vācā khilam balam

original: Bhk_14.63-2 āpapṛcche ca sugrīvaṃ svaṃ deśaṃ visasarja ca.
analyzed: āpapṛcche ca sugrīvam svam deśam visasarja ca

original: Bhk_14.64-1 ādideśa sa kiṣkindhāṃ rāghavau netumaṅgadam,

original: Bhk_14.64-2 pratijajñe svayaṃ caiva sugrīvo rakṣasā vadham.
analyzed: pratijajñe svayam ca eva sugrīvaḥ rakṣasā vadham

original: Bhk_14.65-2 vibhīṣaṇāditi śrutvā taṃ nidadhyau raghūttamaḥ.
analyzed: vibhīṣaṇāt iti śrutvā tam nidadhyau raghūttamaḥ
tatas vijaghaṭe śailaiḥ udvelam pupluve mbudhiḥ
vṛkṣebhyaḥ cucyute puṣpaiḥ
virejuḥ bhāsurāḥ diśaḥ
jagāhire mbudhim nāgā
vavau vāyuḥ manoramaḥ
tejāṃsi śaṃśamāṃcakruḥ
śara bandhāḥ viśiśliṣuḥ
bhrejire kṣatavat yodhā
lebhe saṃjñām ca lakṣmaṇaḥ
vibhīṣaṇaḥ pi babhrāje
garutmān prāpa ca ā ntikam
saṃpasparśā tha kākutsthau
jajñāte tau gata vyathau
tayoḥ ātmānam ācakhyau
yayau ca ā tha yathāgatam
svenuḥ titviṣuḥ udyemuḥ atcakhnuḥ parvatān tarūn

original: Bhk_14.70-2 vānarā dadramuś cā 'tha saṃgrāmaṃ cā''śaśāśire.
analyzed: vānarāḥ dadramuḥ ca ā tha saṃgrāmam ca aśaśāśire
ḍuḍhaukire punar laṅkām
bubudhe tān daśānanaḥ
jīvataḥ ca viveda rīn
babhraṃśe sau dhṛteḥ tatas

original: Bhk_14.72-1 sasraṃse śara-bandhena divyeneti bubunda saḥ,
analyzed: sasraṃse śara bandhena divyena iti bubunda saḥ

original: Bhk_14.72-2 babhājā 'tha paraṃ mohamūhāṃcakre jayaṃ na ca.

analyzed: siṃha āsyaiḥ yuyuje tasya vṛka āsyaiḥ ca rathaḥ khagaiḥ
tvaktraiḥ saṃvivyayuḥ dehān
vāhanāni adhiśiśyire
ānarjuḥ nṛ bhujaḥ ustrāṇi
vavañcuḥ ca āhava kṣitim
adhyuvāsa ratham
teye purāc
cukṣāva cā śubham
saṃśrāvayāṃcakārā khyām dhūmrākṣaḥ tatvare tathā
nililye mūrdhni gṛdhraḥ usya
krūrāḥ dhvāṅkṣāḥ vivāśire

tatas prajaghaṭe yuddham
śastrāṇi āsuḥ parasparam

ca syemuś
cukūrdire tathā
rurujuḥ bhrejire
pheṇuḥ
bahudhā hari rākṣasāḥ

bhīṣayāṃcakrire parān
rattam pracuścutuḥ kṣaṇṇāḥ
śiśviyuḥ bāṇa vikṣatāḥ

original: Bhk_14.79-2 asyatāṃ śuśuvur bāṇān bhujāḥ sā'ṅguṣṭha-muṣṭayaḥ.
analyzed: asyatām śuśuvuḥ bāṇān bhujāḥ sa aṅguṣṭha muṣṭayaḥ
raṇe cikrīḍa dhūmrākṣaḥ
tam tatarja anilātmajaḥ
ādade ca śilām

papāta rākṣasaḥ bhūmau
rarāṭa ca bhayaṃkaram
tutoda gadayā ca arim

original: Bhk_14.82-1 akampanas tato yoddhuṃ cakame rāvaṇā'jñayā,
analyzed: akampanaḥ tatas yoddhum cakame rāvaṇa ājñayā
sa rathena a bhidudrāva
jughure ca ati bhairavam
paspande tasya vāma akṣi
sasyamuḥ ca aśivāḥ khagāḥ
tān vavrājā vamatyā sau
babhāse ca raṇe śaraiḥ
khamūyuḥ
vasudhām ūvuḥ sāyakāḥ rajju vat tatāḥ
tasmāt balaiḥ apatrepe
puprotha smai na kaścana
sa bhasmasāt cakāra arīn
dudāva ca kṛtānta vat
cukrodha mārutiḥ
tāla muccakhne ca mahā śikham
yamāyā kampanam tena niruvāpa mahā paśum

original: Bhk_14.86-2 babhrajja nihate tasmin śoko rāvaṇamagnivat.
analyzed: babhrat ja nihate tasmin śokaḥ rāvaṇam agni vat
sa bibhreṣa
pracukṣoda
dantaiḥ oṣṭham cakhāda ca
pragopāyāṃcakārā śu yatnena paritas puram
prahastam arthayāṃcakre yoddhum adbhuta vikramam
kim vicāreṇa raja indra
yuddha arthāḥ vayam iti sau
śaṅkitaḥ yoddhum utsehe ca mahā rathaḥ
niryemire sya yoddhāraḥ
ca aśva kuñjaram
yuyujuḥ syandanān aśvaiḥ ījuḥ devān purohitāḥ
ānarcuḥ brāhmaṇān samyak āśiṣaḥ ca aśaśaṃsire
ūhire mūrdhni siddhārthā
gāvaḥ ca ā lebhire bhaṭaiḥ

jijñāsāṃcakrire hayān
laluḥ khaḍgān
mamārjuḥ ca
mamṛjuḥ ca paraśvadhān
alaṃcakre
samālebhe vavase
bubhuje pape
jahase ca kṣaṇam
yānaiḥ nirjagme yoddhṛbhiḥ tatas
viprān prahastaḥ ānarca
juhāva ca vibhāvasum
saṃvargayāṃcakārā ā ptān
candanena lilepa ca
cacāma madhu mārdvīkam
tvaktram ca ācakace varam
uṣṇīṣam mumuce cāru
ratham
ca jujuṣe śubham
ālalambe mahā astrāṇi
gantum pravavṛte tatas
ājaghnuḥ tūrya jātāni
tuṣṭuvuḥ ca ā nujīvinaḥ
rajaḥ pravavṛdhe ghoram
ghoṣaḥ ca vyānaśe diśaḥ
tam yāntam dudruvuḥ gṛdhrāḥ

āvavuḥ vāyavaḥ ghorāḥ
khādulkāḥ ca pracakṣaruḥ
sasyande śoṇitam vyoma
raṇa aṅgāni prajajvaluḥ
rathāḥ pracaskhaluḥ sa aśvāḥ na
raraṃha aśva kuñjaram
pratodāḥ jagaluḥ
vāmamānañcuḥ yajñiyāḥ mṛgāḥ
dadāla bhūḥ
pupūre dyauḥ
kapīnām api niḥsvanaiḥ
mima iha raktam hasti aśvam
rākṣasāḥ ca nitiṣṭhivuḥ

nirdayam ca prajahratuḥ
didviśuḥ
dudyuvuḥ
cacchuḥ
caklamuḥ
suṣupuḥ hatāḥ
cakhādire cakhāduḥ ca
vilepuḥ ca raṇe bhaṭāḥ
prahastasya purā umātyān jihiṃsuḥ
dadhṛṣuḥ tathā

original: Bhk_14.102-2 vānarāḥ, karma senānī rakṣasāṃ cakṣame ne tat.
analyzed: vānarāḥ karma senā nīḥ rakṣasām cakṣame ne tat
ūrṇunāva sa śastra oghaiḥ vānarāṇām anīkinīm
śaśāsa ca bahūn
yodhān
jīvitena viveca ca
āsasañja bhayam teṣām
didyute ca yathā raviḥ
na āyayāsa
dviṣat dehaiḥ jagāhe ca diśaḥ daśa

original: Bhk_14.105-2 saṃgrāmād babhraśuḥ kecid yayācuś cā 'pare 'bhayam.
analyzed: saṃgrāmāt babhraśuḥ kecid yayācuḥ ca ā pare bhayam

original: Bhk_14.106-1 evaṃ vijigye tāṃ senāṃ prahasto,
analyzed: evam vijigye tām senām prahastaḥ
tidadarpa ca
śaśāma na ca saṃkruddhaḥ
nirjugopa niśācarān
cukrudhe tatra nīlena
taruḥ ca uccikṣipe mahān

original: Bhk_14.107-2 prahasto 'bhihatas tena bāṇān visasṛje bahūn,
analyzed: prahastaḥ bhihataḥ tena bāṇān visasṛje bahūn
sehe kapī
ratha aśvān ca ripoḥ tatarha śākhinā

cikhide na ca

nunoda śākhinam nīla
āvavre musalī tarum
viyati ānabhratuḥ
bhūmau maṇḍalāni viceratuḥ
pradudruvatuḥ anyonyam vīrau
śaśramatuḥ na ca

original: Bhk_14.111-2 kṣatas tayā mamārā 'sāvāśiśrāya ca bhū-talam.

neśuḥ citrāḥ niśācarāḥ
jeruḥ āśāḥ daśa āsyasya

original: Bhk_14.113-1 yadā na pheluḥ kṣaṇadā-carāṇāṃ manorathā rāma-balā'bhiyoge,
analyzed: yadā na pheluḥ kṣaṇadā carāṇām manorathāḥ rāma bala abhiyoge

vyācakhyuḥ uccais ca hatam prahastam

original: Bhk_15.1-2 prātiṣṭhipac ca bodhā'rthaṃ kumbhakarṇasya rākṣasān,
analyzed: prātiṣṭhipat ca bodha artham kumbhakarṇasya rākṣasān
te bhyaguḥ bhavanam tasya
suptam ca aikṣiṣata tha tam
vyāhārṣuḥ tumulān śabdān
daṇḍaiḥ ca ā vadhiṣuḥ drutam
keśān aluñciṣuḥ
tasya gajān gātreṣu acikraman
śītaiḥ abhyaṣican toyaiḥ alātaiḥ ca api adambhiṣuḥ
nakhaiḥ akartiṣuḥ tīkṣṇaiḥ adāṅkṣuḥ daśanaiḥ tathā
śitaiḥ atautsuḥ śūlaiḥ ca
bherīḥ ca avīvadan śubhāḥ

original: Bhk_15.5-1 sa tān nā 'jīgaṇat sarvā- nicchayā 'buddha ca svayam,
analyzed: sa tān nā jīgaṇat sarvāḥ nicchayā buddha ca svayam

original: Bhk_15.5-2 abūbudhata kasmān mā- maprākṣīc ca niśā-carān.
analyzed: abūbudhata kasmāt mā maprākṣīt ca niśācarān
te bhāṣiṣata rājā tvām didṛkṣuḥ kṣaṇadā cara
sā usnā āsīt
vyalipan
māṃsam ap sāsīt
vāruṇīm apāt
nyavasiṣṭa tatas draṣṭum rāvaṇam

rājā yāntam tam adrākṣīt udasthāt ca īṣat āsanāt

original: Bhk_15.8-1 atuṣat, pīṭhamāsanne niradikṣac ca kāñcanam.
analyzed: atuṣat pīṭham āsanne niradikṣat ca kāñcanam

original: Bhk_15.9-1 avādīn “māṃ kimityāhvo” rājñā ca pratyavādi saḥ
analyzed: avādīt mām kim iti āhvaḥ rājñā ca pratyavādi saḥ
mā ajñāsīḥ tvam sukhī
rāmaḥ yat akārṣīt sa rakṣasām
udatārīt udanvantam
puram naḥ paritas rudhat

original: Bhk_15.10-2 vyadyotiṣṭa raṇe śastrairanaiṣīd rākṣasān kṣayam.
analyzed: vyadyotiṣṭa raṇe śastraiḥ anaiṣīt rākṣasān kṣayam

original: Bhk_15.11-2 bandhus tvamarcitaḥ snehān mādviṣo na vadhīr mama
analyzed: bandhuḥ tvam arcitaḥ snehāt mā a dviṣaḥ na vadhīḥ mama

original: Bhk_15.12-1 vīryaṃ mā na dadarśas tvaṃ,
analyzed: vīryam mā na dadarśaḥ tvam
mā na trāsthāḥ kṣatām puram
tava ā drākṣma vayam vīryam
tvam ajaiṣīḥ purā surān
avocat kumbhakarṇaḥ tam
vayam mantrebhyadhāma yat
na tvam sarvam tat aśrauṣīḥ
phalam tasya idam āgamat
prājña vākyāni avāmaṃsthāḥ
mūrkha vākyeṣu avāsthithāḥ
adhyagīṣṭhāḥ ca śāstrāṇi
pratyapatthāḥ hitam na ca
mūrkhāḥ tvām avavañcanta
ye vigraham acīkaran

original: Bhk_15.15-2 abhāṇīn mālyavān yuktamakṣaṃsthās tvaṃ na tan madāt
analyzed: abhāṇīt mālyavān tvam na tat madāt
rāghavasya ā muṣaḥ kāntā māptaiḥ uktaḥ na
mā na anubhūḥ svakān doṣān
mā muhaḥ mā ruṣaḥ dhunā
tasya api atyakramīt kālo
yat tadā aham avādiṣam
rakṣāsi paraiḥ
kośān tvam avyayīḥ
sandhāna kāraṇam tejaḥ nyagabhūt te
kṛthāḥ tathā

original: Bhk_15.18-2 yat tvaṃ vairāṇi kośaṃ ca saha-daṇḍamajiglapaḥ.“
analyzed: yat tvam vairāṇi kośam ca saha daṇḍam ajiglapaḥ

original: Bhk_15.19-1 akrudhac cā'bhyadhād vākyaṃ kumbhakarṇaṃ daśānanaḥ
analyzed: akrudhat ca abhyadhāt vākyam kumbhakarṇam daśānanaḥ
kim tvam mām ajugupsiṣṭhāḥ
na aididhaḥ sva parākramam
mā ujjigrahaḥ su nītāni
mā sma kraṃsthāḥ na saṃyuge

original: Bhk_15.20-2 mopālabdhāh kṛtair doṣair mā na vākṣīr hitaṃ param.“
analyzed: mā upālabdhāh kṛtaiḥ doṣaiḥ mā na vākṣīḥ hitam param
kumbhakarṇaḥ tatas garjīt
bhaṭān ca nyān nyavīvṛtat
upāyaṃsta mahā astrāṇi
niragāt ca drutam puras
mūrdhnā divam iva ā lekhīt
kham vyāpat vapuṣā ūruṇā
pādābhyām kṣmām iva
dṛṣṭyā dhākṣīt iva dviśas
dagdha śailaḥ iva ā bhāsīt
prākraṃsta kṣaya megha vat
prācakampat udanvantam
rākṣasān api atitrasat
sa pakṣaḥ driḥ iva ā ca alīn
nyaśvasīt kalpa vāyu vat

original: Bhk_15.24-2 abhārṣīd dhvaninā lokā- nabhrājiṣṭa kṣayā'gni-vat.
analyzed: abhārṣīt dhvaninā lokāḥ nabhrājiṣṭa kṣaya agni vat
anaṃsīt bhūḥ bhareṇa sya
raṃhasā śākhinaḥ luṭhan
siṃhāḥ prādudruvan bhītāḥ
prākṣubhan kulaparvatāḥ
utpātāḥ prāvṛtan tasya
dyauḥ aśīkiṣṭa śoṇitam
vāyavaḥ uvāsiṣuḥ bhīmāḥ
krūrāḥ dvijāḥ
a spandiṣṭā kṣi vāmam ca
ghorāḥ ca ā rāṭiṣuḥ śivāḥ
nyapaptat musale gṛdhrā
dīptayā pāti ca ulkayā

original: Bhk_15.28-1 āṃhiṣṭa tāna-saṃmānya darpāt sa pradhana-kṣitim,
analyzed: āṃhiṣṭa tāna saṃmānya darpāt sa pradhana kṣitim
tatonardīt anandīt ca
śatrūn āhvāsta ca āhave
prāśīt na cā tṛpat krūraḥ
kṣudh ca asya avṛdhat aśnataḥ

original: Bhk_15.29-2 adhād vasāmadhāsīc ca rudhiraṃ vana-vāsinām.
analyzed: adhāt ca rudhiram vana vāsinām
māmsenā syā śvatām kukṣī
jaṭharam ca ā pyaśiśviyat

original: Bhk_15.30-2 bahūnāmaglucat prāṇā- naglocīc ca raṇe yaśaḥ.
analyzed: bahūnām aglucat prāṇāḥ na glocīt ca raṇe yaśaḥ

original: Bhk_15.31-1 sāmarthyaṃ cā 'pi so 'stambhīd vikramaṃ cā'sya nā 'stabhan,
analyzed: sāmarthyam ca ā pi saḥ stambhīt vikramam ca asya nā stabhan
śākhinaḥ kecid adhyaṣṭhuḥ nyamāṅkṣuḥ apare mbudhau
anye tu alaṅghiṣuḥ
śailān
guhāsu anye nyaleṣata
kecid āsiṣata stabdhā
bhayāt kecid aghūrṇiṣuḥ
udatāriṣuḥ ambhodhim vānarāḥ setunā pare
alajjiṣṭa aṅgadaḥ tatra
pratyavāsthita ca ūrjitam

original: Bhk_15.34-1 sattvaṃ samadudhukṣac ca vānarāṇāmayuddha ca,
analyzed: sattvam samadudhukṣat ca vānarāṇām ayuddha ca
tatas śailān udakṣaipsuḥ udagūriṣata drumān
anardiṣuḥ kapi vyāghrāḥ
samyak ca ā yutsata āhave
tānamardīdakhādīt ca
nirāsthat ca tala āhatān

original: Bhk_15.36-1 prācucūrṇac ca pādābhyāmabibhīṣata ca drutam,
analyzed: prācucūrṇat ca pādābhyām abibhīṣata ca drutam

original: Bhk_15.36-2 atarhīc caiva śūlena kumbhakarṇaḥ plavaṅgamān.
analyzed: atarhīt ca eva śūlena kumbhakarṇaḥ plavaṅgamān
atautsīt gadayā gāḍham apiṣat ca upagūhanaiḥ
janubhyām adamīt ca anyān
hasta vartam avīvṛtat
adāliṣuḥ śilā dehe
cūrṇyabhūvan mahā drumāḥ

original: Bhk_15.38-2 kṣiptās tasya na cā 'cetīt tānasau,
analyzed: kṣiptāḥ tasya na cā cetīt tānasau
nā pi cā kṣubhat

original: Bhk_15.39-1 adrāṣṭāṃ taṃ raghu-vyāghrau ākhyac cainaṃ vibhīṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: adrāṣṭām tam raghu vyāghrau ākhyat ca enam vibhīṣaṇaḥ
eṣa vyajeṣṭa deva indram
na aśaṅkiṣṭa vivasvataḥ
yakṣa indra śaktimat śāsīn
nā prothīt asya kaścana

original: Bhk_15.40-2 kumbhakarṇān na bhaiṣṭaṃ mā yuvāmasmān nṛpā''tmajau.
analyzed: kumbhakarṇāt na bhaiṣṭam mā yuvām asmāt nṛpa ātmajau
ghnantam mā upekṣiṣāthām ca
mā na kārṣṭam iha ādaram

original: Bhk_15.41-2 “amuṃ mā na vadhiṣṭe“ti rāmo'vādīt tataḥ kapīn.
analyzed: amum mā na vadhiṣṭa iti rāmā uvādīt tatas kapīn
te vyarāsiṣuḥ āhvanta rākṣasam ca pi apiplavan
ababhāsan svakāḥ śaktīḥ
druma śailam vyakāriṣuḥ
te tam vyāśiṣata kṣautsuḥ pādaiḥ
dantaiḥ tathā chidan
ārjijat śarabhaḥ vṛkṣam
nīlaḥ tvā dita parvatam
ṛṣabhaḥ
te taiḥ arim atardiṣuḥ
asphūrjīt
giri śṛṅgam ca vyasrākṣīt gandhamādanaḥ
akūrdiṣṭa
vyakārīt ca gavākṣaḥ bhūdharān bahūn

original: Bhk_15.45-2 sa tān nā'jīgaṇad vīraḥ kumbhakarṇo'vyathiṣṭa na.
analyzed: sa tān na ajīgaṇat vīraḥ kumbhakarṇaḥ ūvyathiṣṭa na

original: Bhk_15.46-1 amanthīc ca parā'nīkamaploṣṭa ca niraṅkuśaḥ,
analyzed: amanthīt ca para anīkam aploṣṭa ca niraṅkuśaḥ
nihantum ca aṅkam āgatān
vyakrukṣat vānara anīkam
saṃpalāyiṣṭa cāyati
hastābhyām naśyat akrākṣīt
bhīme ca upādhita ānane
raktena ciklidat bhūmim
sainyaiḥ ca ā tastarat hataiḥ
nā tārpsīt bhakṣayan krūro
nā śramat ghnan plavaṅgamān
na yoddhum aśakan kecid
nā ḍhaukiṣata kecana
prāṇaśat nāsikābhyām ca
vaktreṇa ca vanaukasaḥ
udare ca ā jaran anye tasya pātāla sannibhe
ākrandiṣuḥ
sakhīn āhvan
prapalāyiṣata asvidan
rakta maścyotiṣuḥ kṣuṇṇāḥ
kṣatāḥ ca kapayaḥ utṛṣan
upāsthāyi nṛpaḥ bhagnaiḥ asau sugrīvam aijihat

original: Bhk_15.52-1 yoddhuṃ so pyaruṣacchatrorairirac ca mahā-drumam.
analyzed: yoddhum saḥ pi aruṣat śatroḥ airirat ca mahā drumam
tam prāptam prāsahiṣṭa ariḥ
śaktim ca ugrām udagrahīt
sa tām abibhramat bhīmām
vānara indrasya ca ā mucat

original: Bhk_15.53-2 prāpaptan mārutis tatra tāṃ cā 'lāsīd viyad-gatām.
analyzed: prāpaptat mārutiḥ tatra tām ca ā lāsīt viyat gatām

original: Bhk_15.54-1 aśobhiṣṭā'cakhaṇḍac ca śaktiṃ vīro, na cā 'yasat.
analyzed: aśobhiṣṭa acakhaṇḍat ca śaktim vīraḥ na cā yasat
lauha bhāra sahasreṇa nirmitā nirakāri me
rakṣaḥ
girim ca udakhanīt gurum
vyasṛṣṭa tam kapīndrasya
tena amūrcchīt asau kṣataḥ
aloṭhiṣṭa ca bhū pṛṣṭhe
śoṇitam ca ā pyasusruvat
tam ādāya apalāyiṣṭa
vyarociṣṭa ca rākṣasaḥ
abhaiṣuḥ kapayaḥ
nv ārat kumbhukarṇam marut sutaḥ
śanais abodhi sugrīvaḥ
sā uluñcīt karṇa nāsikam
rākṣasasya
na cā trāsīt
pranaṣṭum ayatiṣṭa ca
akrodhi kumbhakarṇena
peṣṭum ārambhi ca kṣitau
sugrīvaḥ syāḥ bhraśat hastāt
samagāhiṣṭa ca ambaram

original: Bhk_15.59-2 tūrṇamanvasṛpad rāma- mānanandac ca vānarān.
analyzed: tūrṇam anvasṛpat rāma mā ananandat ca vānarān

original: Bhk_15.60-1 atatvarac ca tān yoddhumaciceṣṭac ca rāghavau.
analyzed: atatvarat ca tān yoddhum aciceṣṭat ca rāghavau
kumbhakarṇaḥ nyavartiṣṭa
vānarāḥ
aviveṣṭat nṛpa ādeśāt ārukṣan ca āśu rākṣasam
tān adhāvīt samārūḍhān te kulāḥ
agrasiṣṭa
vyadhāviṣṭa
samāślikṣat ca nirdayam
te ca pyaghoriṣuḥ ghoram
raktam ca ā vamiṣuḥ mukhaiḥ

original: Bhk_15.63-1 sa cā'pi rudhirair mattaḥ sveṣāmapyadayiṣṭa na,
analyzed: sa ca api rudhiraiḥ mattaḥ sveṣām api adayiṣṭa na
agrahīt ca ā yuḥ anyeṣām aruddha ca parākramam
saṃtrastānām apāhāri sattvam ca vanavāsinām

original: Bhk_15.64-2 acchedi lakṣmaṇenā'sya kirīṭaṃ kavacaṃ tathā.
analyzed: acchedi lakṣmaṇena asya kirīṭam kavacam tathā

original: Bhk_15.65-1 abhedi ca śarair dehaḥ prāśaṃsīt taṃ niśā-caraḥ.
analyzed: abhedi ca śaraiḥ dehaḥ prāśaṃsīt tam niśācaraḥ
aspardhiṣṭa ca rāmeṇa tena syā kṣipsatā iṣavaḥ
yaiḥ aghāni kharo
vālī
mārīco
dūṣaṇaḥ tathā
avāmaṃsta sa tān darpāt
prodayaṃsīt ca mudgaram

original: Bhk_15.67-1 vāyavyā'streṇa taṃ pāṇiṃ rāmo 'cchaitsīt sahā''yudham,
analyzed: vāyavya astreṇa tam pāṇim chaitsīt saha āyudham
sā vadhāvīt ca ā ri saṃmukham

original: Bhk_15.68-1 sa-vṛkṣamacchidat tasya śakrā'streṇa karaṃ nṛpaḥ,
analyzed: sa vṛkṣam acchidat tasya śakra astreṇa karam nṛpaḥ
jaṅghe cā śīśatat bāṇaiḥ a prāsīdiṣubhiḥ mukham
aindreṇa hṛdaye vyātsīt
saḥ dhyavātsīt ca gām hataḥ

original: Bhk_15.69-2 apikṣātāṃ sahasre dve tad-dehena vanaukasām.
analyzed: sahasre dve tad dehena vanaukasām
astāviṣuḥ surāḥ rāmam
diśaḥ prāpan niśācarāḥ
bhūḥ akampiṣṭa sā adri indrā
vyacālīt ambhasām patiḥ
hatam rakṣāṃsi rājānam kumbhakarṇam aśiśravan
arodīt rāvaṇaḥ śocīn
moham ca ā śiśriyat param

original: Bhk_15.72-1 apaprathad guṇān bhrāturacikīrtac ca vikramam,
analyzed: apaprathat guṇān bhrātuḥ acikīrtat ca vikramam
kruddhena kumbhakarṇena ye dirṣiśata śatravaḥ
katham nvajīviṣuḥ te ca
sa cā mṛta mahā balaḥ
ayuyutsiṣatā śvāsya kumārāḥ rāvaṇam tatas

original: Bhk_15.74-1 devāntako 'tikāyaś ca triśirāḥ sa narāntakaḥ
analyzed: devāntakaḥ tikāyaḥ ca triśirāḥ sa narāntakaḥ

original: Bhk_15.74-2 te cāṃ''hiṣata saṃgrāmaṃ balino rāvaṇā''tmajāḥ.
analyzed: te ca āṃhiṣata saṃgrāmam balinaḥ rāvaṇa ātmajāḥ

original: Bhk_15.75-1 yuddhonmattaṃ ca mattaṃ ca rājā rakṣārthamāñjihat
analyzed: yuddha unmattam ca mattam ca rājā rakṣā artham ān jihat

original: Bhk_15.75-2 sutānāṃ, niragātāṃ tau rākṣasau raṇa-paṇḍitau.
analyzed: sutānām niragātām tau rākṣasau raṇa paṇḍitau
taiḥ ajeṣata sainyāni
dviṣaḥ kāriṣata kulāḥ
parvatān iva te bhūmau acaiṣuḥ vānara uttamān
aṅgadena samam yoddhum aghaṭiṣṭa narāntakaḥ
praiṣiṣat rākṣasaḥ prāsam
saḥ sphoṭīt aṅgada urasi
aśvān vāli sutaḥ ca muṣṭinā

original: Bhk_15.78-2 rāvaṇiś cā 'vyatho yoddhumārabdha ca mahīṃ gataḥ.
analyzed: rāvaṇiḥ ca vyathaḥ yoddhum ārabdha ca mahīm gataḥ
tasyāḥ prāṇāḥ muṣṭinā vāli sūnunā

original: Bhk_15.79-2 prādudruvaṃs tataḥ kruddhāḥ sarve rāvaṇayo'ṅgadam.
analyzed: prādudruvan tatas kruddhāḥ sarve
tatas nīla hanūmantau rāvaṇīn avaveṣṭatām

original: Bhk_15.80-2 akāriṣṭāṃ girīṃs tuṅgānarautsīt triśirāḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: akāriṣṭām girīn tuṅgān arautsīt triśirāḥ śaraiḥ
parigheṇa vadhiṣṭa tha raṇe devāntakaḥ balī
muṣṭinā dadarat tasya mūrdhānam mārutātmajaḥ
adīdipat tatas vīryam
nīlam ca apīpiḍat śaraiḥ
yuddha unmattaḥ
tu nīlena giriṇā anāyi saṃkṣayam

original: Bhk_15.83-1 ababhrājat tataḥ śaktiṃ triśirāḥ pavanā''tmaje,
analyzed: ababhrājat tatas śaktim triśirāḥ pavanātmaje

original: Bhk_15.83-2 hanūmatā kṣatās tasya raṇe 'mṛṣata vājinaḥ.
analyzed: hanūmatā kṣatāḥ tasya raṇe mṛṣata vājinaḥ
asrasat ca āhataḥ mūrdhni
khaḍgam ca ā jīharat dviṣā

original: Bhk_15.84-2 prāṇānaujjhīc ca khaḍgena chinnais tenaiva mūrdhabhiḥ.
analyzed: prāṇān aujjhīt ca khaḍgena chinnaiḥ tena eva mūrdhabhiḥ
mattena ā māri saṃprāpya śarabhāḥ tām mahā gadām
sahasra hariṇā krīḍīt atikāyaḥ tatas raṇe
rathena ā vivyathat ca arīn
vyacārīt ca niraṅkuśaḥ
vibhīṣaṇena saḥ khyāyi rāghavasya mahā rathaḥ
svayambhuvam atūtuṣat
aśikṣiṣṭa mahā astrāṇi
raṇe rakṣīt ca rākṣasān
adya gīṣṭa arthaśāstrāṇi
yamasya ā hnoṣṭa vikramam
deva āhaveṣu adīpiṣṭa
nā janiṣṭā sya sādhvasam
eṣa rāvaṇiḥ āpādi vānarāṇām bhayaṅkaraḥ

original: Bhk_15.89-2 āhvatā 'tha sa kākutsthaṃ dhanuś cā 'pusphurad guru.
analyzed: sa kākutstham dhanuḥ ca ā pusphurat guru

original: Bhk_15.90-1 saumitriḥ sarpa-vat siṃhamārdidat taṃ mahā''have.
analyzed: saumitriḥ sarpa vat siṃham ārdidat tam mahā āhave
tau prāvīvṛtatām jetum śara jālāni anekaśas
acchaittām ca mahātmānau
ciram aśramatām na ca

original: Bhk_15.91-2 tathā tāvāsthatāṃ bāṇānatāniṣṭāṃ tamo yathā.
analyzed: tathā tau āsthatām bāṇa ānata aniṣṭām tamaḥ yathā
saurya āgneye vyakāriṣṭām astre rākṣasa lakṣmaṇau

original: Bhk_15.92-2 te copāgamatā nāśaṃ samāsādya parasparam
analyzed: te ca upāgamatā nāśam samāsādya parasparam

original: Bhk_15.93-1 abibhrajat tataḥ śastramaiṣīkaṃ rākṣaso raṇe,
analyzed: abibhrajat tatas śastram aiṣīkam rākṣasaḥ raṇe
tat api adhvasat āsādya māhendram lakṣmaṇa īritam
tatas saumitriḥ asmārṣīt adeviṣṭa ca durjayam
brahmāstram
tena mūrdhānam adadhvaṃsat naradviṣaḥ
krandīt daśagrīvaḥ tam āśiśvasat indrajit
nirayāsīt ca saṃkruddhaḥ
prārcicat ca svayambhuvam
ahauṣīt kṛṣṇavartmānam
samayaṣṭā stra maṇḍalam

original: Bhk_15.96-2 so 'labdha brahmaṇaḥ śastraṃ syandanaṃ ca jayā''vaham.
analyzed: saḥ brahmaṇaḥ śastram syandanam ca jaya āvaham
tam adhyāsiṣṭa dīpra agram amodiṣṭa ca rāvaṇiḥ
channa rūpaḥ dehān rāvaṇa vidviṣām
saptaṣaṣṭim plavaṅgānām koṭīḥ bāṇaiḥ asūṣupat

original: Bhk_15.98-2 niśā'nte rāvaṇiḥ kruddho rāghavau ca vyamūmuhat.
analyzed: niśā ante rāvaṇiḥ kruddhaḥ rāghavau ca vyamūmuhat
apisphavat sva sāmarthyam agūhīt sāyakaiḥ diśaḥ
aghorīt ca mahāghoram
gatvā
praiṣīt ca rāvaṇam
vibhīṣaṇaḥ tatas sa sphurau rāma lakṣmaṇau

original: Bhk_15.100-2 apārīt sa gṛhītolko hata-śeṣān plavaṅgamān.
analyzed: apārīt sa gṛhīta ulkaḥ hata śeṣān plavaṅgamān
mā śociṣṭa
raghu vyāghrau na amṛṣātām iti bruvan

original: Bhk_15.101-2 avābuddha sa nīlā''dīn nihatān kapi-yūtha-pān.
analyzed: avābuddha sa nīla ādīn nihatān kapi yūthapān

original: Bhk_15.102-1 tatraiṣaj jāmbavān prāṇīdudamīlīc ca locane,
analyzed: tatra aiṣat jāmbavān prāṇīt udamīlīt ca locane
paulastyam ca agadīt kaccit ajīvīt mārutātmajaḥ
tasya kṣeme mahā rāja
nā mṛṣmahi akhilāḥ vayam

original: Bhk_15.103-2 paulastyo 'śiśravat taṃ ca jīvantaṃ pavanā''tmajam.
analyzed: paulastyaḥ śiśravat tam ca jīvantam pavanātmajam
āyiṣṭa mārutiḥ tatra
tau ca pyahṛṣatām tatas
prāhaiṣṭām himavat pṛṣṭhe sarva oṣadhi girim tatas
tau hanūmantam ānetum oṣadhīm mṛta jīvinīm
sandhānakaraṇīm ca anyām viśalyakaraṇīm tathā
prodapāti nabhaḥ tena
sa ca prāpi mahā giriḥ
yasmin ajvaliṣuḥ rātrau mahā auṣadhyaḥ sahasraśas

original: Bhk_15.107-1 niracāyi yadā bhedo nauṣadhīnāṃ hanū-matā,
analyzed: niracāyi yadā bhedaḥ na oṣadhīnām hanūmatā

original: Bhk_15.107-2 sarva eva samāhāri tadā śailaḥ mahauṣadhiḥ.
analyzed: sarve eva samāhāri tadā śailaḥ mahauṣadhiḥ
prāṇiṣuḥ nihatāḥ kecid
kecid tu prodamīliṣuḥ
tamaḥ nye hāsiṣuḥ yodhā
vyajṛmbhiṣata ca apare
ajighrapan tathā eva anyān oṣadhīḥ ālipan tathā
evam tecetiṣuḥ sarve
vīryam ca adhiṣata adhikam
ajihladat sa kākutsthau
śeṣān ca ā jījivat kapīn

original: Bhk_15.110-2 hanūmānatha te laṅkā- magninā 'dīdipan drutam.
analyzed: hanūmān atha te laṅkām agninā dīdipan drutam
samanātsīt tatas sainyam amārjīt bhalla tomaram
amārkṣīt ca sipatra ādīn ababhāsat paraśvadhān
kumbhakarṇa sutau tatra samanaddhām mahā balau
nikumbhaḥ ca eva kumbhaḥ ca
prāpatām tau plavaṅgamān

original: Bhk_15.113-1 agopiṣṭāṃ purīṃ laṅkāmagauptāṃ rakṣasāṃ balam,
analyzed: a gopiṣṭām purīm laṅkām a gauptām rakṣasām balam
atyāktām āyudha anīkam anaiṣṭām ca kṣayam dviṣaḥ
akokūyiṣṭa tat sainyam
prapalāyiṣṭa ca ākulam
acyutat ca kṣatam raktam
hatam ca ā dhyaśayiṣṭa gām
aṅgadena ā hasātām tau yudhi akampana kampanau

original: Bhk_15.115-2 abhyārdīd vālinaḥ putraṃ prajaṅgho 'pi sa-matsaraḥ.
analyzed: abhyārdīt vālinaḥ putram prajaṅghaḥ pi sa matsaraḥ

lokavādān na ca ā bibheḥ
dharma duṣaṇa
nūnam tvam nā jānā
na śṛṇoḥ idam

original: Bhk_17.35-1 nirākṛtya yathā bandhūn laghu-tvaṃ yātya-saṃśayam.“
analyzed: nirākṛtya yathā bandhūn laghu tvam yāti asaṃśayam
pitṛvyeṇa tatas vākyam abhyadhīyata śakrajit
mithyā mā sma vyatikrāmaḥ
mad śīlam mā na badhyatha āh

original: Bhk_17.36-2 satyaṃ samabhavaṃ vaṃśe pāpānāṃ rakṣasāmaham.
analyzed: satyam samabhavam vaṃśe pāpānām rakṣasām aham

original: Bhk_17.37-1 na tvajāyata me śīlaṃ tādṛk,
analyzed: na tu ajāyata me śīlam tādṛś
yādṛś pituḥ tava
kṣaya āvaheṣu doṣeṣu vāryamāṇaḥ mayā ramat
daśagrīvam ham etasmāt atyajam
na tu vidviṣan
para svāni ārjayan
nārīḥ anyadīyāḥ parāmṛśat
vyajighṛkṣat surān nityam
prāmādyat guṇinām hite
āśaṅkata suhṛd bandhūn avṛddhān bahu amanyata

original: Bhk_17.40-1 doṣairaramataibhis te pitā 'tyajyata yair mayā.
analyzed: doṣaiḥ aramata ebhiḥ te pitā tyajyata yaiḥ mayā
tatas uruṣyat anardat ca
dvi viṃśatibhiḥ eva ca
śaraiḥ atāḍayat bandhum
pañcaviṃśatibhiḥ nṛpam

original: Bhk_17.41-2 rāvaṇis tasya saumitriramathnāc caturo hayān.
analyzed: rāvaṇiḥ tasya saumitriḥ amathnāt caturaḥ hayān

original: Bhk_17.42-1 sāgarathiṃ cā 'lunād bāṇairabhanak syandanaṃ tathā,
analyzed: sāgarathim ca ā lunāt bāṇaiḥ abhanak syandanam tathā

original: Bhk_17.42-2 saumitrimakirad bāṇaiḥ parito rāvaṇis tataḥ.
analyzed: saumitrim akirat bāṇaiḥ paritas rāvaṇiḥ tatas
tau asphāvayatām śāktim
bāṇān ca akiratām muhur
vāruṇam lakṣmaṇa ukṣipyat akṣipat raudram indrajit
te parasparam āsādya śastre nāśam agacchatām

original: Bhk_17.44-2 āsuraṃ rākṣasaḥ śastraṃ tato ghoraṃ vyasarjayat,
analyzed: āsuram rākṣasaḥ śastram tatas ghoram vyasarjayat
tasmāt nirapatat bhūri śilā śūla iṣṭi mudgaram
māheśvareṇa saumitriḥ astabhnāt tat su durjayam
tatas raudra samāyuktam māhendram lakṣmaṇaḥ ūsmarat
tena agamyata ghoreṇa
śiraḥ ca ā hriyata dviṣaḥ
atuṣyan amarāḥ sarve
prāhṛṣyan kapi yūthapāḥ
paryaṣvajata saumitrim
mūrdhni ajighrat ca rāghavaḥ
arodīt rākṣasa anīkam arodat nṛ bhujām patiḥ

original: Bhk_17.48-2 maithilyai cā 'śapaddhantuṃ tāṃ prākramata cā''turaḥ.
analyzed: maithilyai ca śapat hantum tām prākramata ca āturaḥ
ayuktam idam tyanye tam āptāḥ pratyavārayan

original: Bhk_17.49-2 nyarundhaṃś cā 'sya panthānaṃ bandhutā śucamāruṇat.
analyzed: nyarundhan ca ā sya panthānam bandhu tā śucam āruṇat
āsphāyatā sya vīra tvam amarṣaḥ ca pyatāyata
rāvaṇasya tatas sainyam samastam ayuyutsayat
agnīnavarivasyan ca te
namasyan ca śaṅkaram
dvijān aprīṇayan śāntyai yātudhānāḥ bhavat bhiyaḥ
paritas paryavāt vāyu rājya gandhiḥ manoramaḥ

original: Bhk_17.52-2 aśrūyata sa puṇyāhaḥ svasti-ghoṣaḥ samuccaran.
analyzed: aśrūyata sa puṇya ahar svasti ghoṣaḥ samuccaran

original: Bhk_17.53-1 yoddhāro 'bibharuḥ śāntyai sā'kṣataṃ vāri mūrdhabhiḥ,
analyzed: yoddhāraḥ bibharuḥ śāntyai sa akṣatam vāri mūrdhabhiḥ
ratnāni ca ā daduḥ gāḥ ca
samavāñchan atha āśiṣaḥ
adihan candanaiḥ śubhraiḥ
vicitram samavastrayan
adhārayan srajaḥ kāntā
varma ca nye dadhuḥ drutam
samakṣṇuvata śastrāṇi
prāmṛjan khaḍga saṃhatīḥ
gaja ādīni samārohan
prātiṣṭhanta tha sa tvarāḥ
apūrayat nabhaḥ śabdaḥ bala saṃvarta saṃbhavaḥ

original: Bhk_17.56-2 apūryanta ca dig-bhāgās tumulais tūrya-nisvanaiḥ.
analyzed: apūryanta ca digbhāgāḥ tumulaiḥ tūrya nisvanaiḥ
āsīt dvāreṣu saṃghaṭṭaḥ ratha aśva dvipa rakṣasām
samahāna nimittaiḥ ca samabhūyata bhīṣaṇaiḥ
kapayaḥ bibhayuḥ tasmin abhañjan ca mahā drumān

original: Bhk_17.58-2 prodakhāyan girīṃs tūrṇamagṛhṇaṃś ca mahā-śilāḥ.
analyzed: prodakhāyan girīn tūrṇam agṛhṇan ca mahā śilāḥ

original: Bhk_17.59-1 tataḥ samabhavad yuddhaṃ prāharan kapi-rākṣasāḥ,
analyzed: tatas samabhavat yuddham prāharan kapi rākṣasāḥ
anyonyena abhyabhūyanta
vimardam asahanta ca
prāvardhata rajaḥ bhaumam
tat vyāśnuta diśaḥ daśa
para ātmīya vivekam ca prāmuṣṇāt kapi rakṣasām

original: Bhk_17.61-1 tato 'dviṣur nirāloke svebhyo 'nyebhyaś ca rākṣasāḥ.
analyzed: tatas dviṣuḥ nirāloke svebhyaḥ nyebhyaḥ ca rākṣasāḥ

original: Bhk_17.61-2 adviṣan vānarāś caiva vānarebhyo 'pi nirdayāḥ
analyzed: adviṣan vānarāḥ ca eva vānarebhyaḥ nirdayāḥ
aghuran te mahā ghoram aścyotan atha śoṇitam

original: Bhk_17.62-2 samapadyata raktena samantāt tena kardamaḥ.
analyzed: samapadyata raktena samantāt tena kardamaḥ
gambhīrāḥ prāvahan nadyaḥ
samajāyanta ca hradāḥ
vṛddham ca tat rajaḥ śāmyat
samavedyanta ca dviṣaḥ
citrīyatā strā oghaiḥ dhanuḥ ca ā dhūnayat mahat

original: Bhk_17.64-2 rāmaḥ, samīhitaṃ tasya nā'cetan sve na cā 'pare.
analyzed: rāmaḥ samīhitam tasya na acetan sve na ca pare

original: Bhk_17.65-1 chinnānaikṣanta bhinnāṃś ca samantād rāma-sāyukaiḥ.
analyzed: chinnān aikṣanta bhinnān ca samantāt rāma sāyukaiḥ

original: Bhk_17.65-2 kruṣṭaṃ hāheti cā 'śṛṇvan na ca rāmaṃ nyarūpayan.
analyzed: kruṣṭam hāhā iti ca śṛṇvan na ca rāmam nyarūpayan
abhinat śatru saṃghātān akṣuṇat vāji kuñjaram
apinaṭ ca ratha anīkam
na cā jñāyata saṃcaran

original: Bhk_17.67-1 daśa danti-sahasrāṇi rathināṃ ca mahā''tmanām
analyzed: daśa danti sahasrāṇi rathinām ca mahātmanām

original: Bhk_17.67-2 caturdaśa sahasrāṇi sā''rohāṇāṃ ca vājinām
analyzed: caturdaśa sahasrāṇi sa ārohāṇām ca vājinām

original: Bhk_17.68-1 lakṣe ca dve padātīnāṃ rāghaveṇa dhanur-bhṛtā
analyzed: lakṣe ca dve padātīnām rāghaveṇa dhanuḥ bhṛtā
anīyanta aṣṭame bhāge divasasya parikṣayam
yama lokam iva agrathnāt
rudra ākrīḍam iva ā karot

original: Bhk_17.69-2 śailairivā 'cinod bhūmiṃ bṛhadbhī rākṣasair hataiḥ.
analyzed: śailaiḥ iva ā cinot bhūmim bṛhadbhiḥ rākṣasaiḥ hataiḥ
astuvan deva gandharvā
vyasmayanta plavaṅgamāḥ
prītiḥ
paulastyaḥ umanyata adbhutam
rākṣasyaḥ prārudan uccais
prājugupsanta rāvaṇam
amuhyat bāla vṛddham ca
janaḥ

original: Bhk_17.72-1 sarvataś cā'bhayaṃ prāpnon naicchan nṛbhyas tu rāvaṇaḥ,
analyzed: sarvatas ca abhayam prāpnot na aicchat nṛbhyaḥ tu rāvaṇaḥ
phalam tasya idam abhyāyāt duruktasya iti ca ā bruvan
tatas dhāvan mahā ghoram ratham āsthāya rāvaṇaḥ
akṣmāyata mahī
gṛdhrāḥ samārāryanta bhīṣaṇāḥ

original: Bhk_17.74-1 meghāḥ sa-vidyuto 'varṣaṃś cela-knopaṃ ca śoṇitam,
analyzed: meghāḥ sa vidyutaḥ varṣan ca ilaknopam ca śoṇitam
avān bhīmāḥ nabhasvantaḥ
prāruvan aśivāḥ śivāḥ
āṭāṭyatā vamatyā sau durnimittāni saṃyuge
adhunot dhanuḥ astra oghaiḥ praurṇonūyata vidviṣaḥ

original: Bhk_17.76-1 vyanāśayaṃs tataḥ śatrūn sugrīvā'stā mahībhṛtaḥ,
analyzed: vyanāśayan tatas śatrūn sugrīvāḥ tāḥ mahībhṛtaḥ
tatas vyarasat aglāyat adhyśeta mahī talam
āścyotat rudhiram
toyam alasat ca ati vihvalam
aśīyata nṛ māṃsa ādām balam sugrīva bādhitam

original: Bhk_17.78-1 virūpākṣas tato krīḍat saṃgrāme matta-hastinā,
analyzed: virūpākṣaḥ krīḍat saṃgrāme matta hastinā
muṣṭinā adālayat tasya mūrdhānam vānara adhipaḥ

original: Bhk_17.79-1 acūrṇayac ca yūpākṣaṃ śilayā tadanantaram.
analyzed: acūrṇayat ca yūpa akṣam śilayā tad anantaram
saṃkruddhaḥ muṣṭinā atubhnāt aṅga dolam mahodaram

original: Bhk_17.80-1 tato 'kuṣṇād daśagrīvaḥ kruddhaḥ prāṇān vanaukasām,
analyzed: kuṣṇāt daśagrīvaḥ kruddhaḥ prāṇān vanaukasām

original: Bhk_17.80-2 agopāyac ca rakṣāṃsi diśaś cā 'rīnabhājayat.
analyzed: agopāyat ca rakṣāṃsi diśaḥ ca rīnabhājayat
ālokayat sa kākutstham adhṛṣṇot
ghoram adhvanat
dhanuḥ abhramayat bhīmam abhīṣayata vidviṣaḥ

original: Bhk_17.82-1 āskandal lakṣmaṇaṃ bānairatyakrāmac ca taṃ drutam,
analyzed: āskandat lakṣmaṇam bānaiḥ atyakrāmat ca tam drutam
rāmam abhyadravat ca iṣu vṛṣṭibhiḥ

original: Bhk_17.83-1 apauhad bāṇa-varṣaṃ tad bhallai rāmo nirākulaḥ,
analyzed: apauhat bāṇa varṣam tat bhallaiḥ rāmaḥ nirākulaḥ
pratyaskunot daṣagrīvam śaraiḥ āśīviṣa upamaiḥ
maṇḍalāni āṭatām śastra saṃhatīḥ
jagat vismāpayetām tau
na ca vīra avasīdatām
vyoma prācinutām bāṇaiḥ
kṣmām akṣmāpayatām gataiḥ

original: Bhk_17.85-2 abhittāṃ tūrṇamanyonyaṃ śikṣāś cā 'tanutāṃ muhuḥ.
analyzed: tūrṇam anyonyam śikṣāḥ ca tanutām muhur
samādhattā suram śastram rākṣasaḥ krūra vikramaḥ

original: Bhk_17.86-2 tadakṣaran mahāsarpān vyāghra-siṃhāṃś ca bhīṣaṇān.
analyzed: tat akṣarat mahā sarpān vyāghra siṃhān ca bhīṣaṇān

original: Bhk_17.87-1 nyaṣedhat pāvakā'streṇa rāmas tad rākṣasas tataḥ
analyzed: nyaṣedhat pāvaka astreṇa rāmaḥ tat rākṣasaḥ tatas
adīvyat raudram ati ugram
musala ādi agalat tatas
gāndharveṇa nyavidyat tat kṣitīndraḥ
tha nara aśanaḥ

original: Bhk_17.88-2 sarva-marmasu kākutstha- maumbhat tīkṣṇaiḥ śilīmukhaiḥ
analyzed: sarva marmasu kākutstha maumbhat tīkṣṇaiḥ śilīmukhaiḥ

original: Bhk_17.89-1 tatas triśirasaṃ tasya prāvṛścal lakṣmaṇo dhvajam,
analyzed: tatas tri śirasam tasya prāvṛścat lakṣmaṇaḥ dhvajam
amathnāt sārathim ca āśu
bhūribhiḥ ca ā tudat śaraiḥ

original: Bhk_17.90-1 aśvān vibhīṣano 'tubhnāt syandanaṃ cā'kṣiṇod drutam,
analyzed: aśvān vibhīṣano tubhnāt syandanam ca akṣiṇot drutam
na akṣubhnāt rākṣaso
bhrātuḥ śaktim ca udavṛhat gurum
tām āpatantīm saumitriḥ tridhā akṛntat śilīmukhaiḥ

original: Bhk_17.91-2 aśabdāyanta paśyantas tataḥ kruddho niśācaraḥ
analyzed: aśabdāyanta paśyantaḥ tatas kruddhaḥ niśācaraḥ
aṣṭa ghaṇṭām mahā śaktim udayacchat mahattarām
rāma anujam tayā vidhyat
sa mahīm vyasuḥ āśrayat
rāghavasya abhṛśāyanta sāyakāḥ
taiḥ upadrutaḥ

original: Bhk_17.93-2 tatas tūrṇaṃ daśagrīvo raṇa-kṣmā paryaśeṣayat.
analyzed: tatas tūrṇam daśagrīvaḥ raṇa kṣmā paryaśeṣayat
sasphurasya udakarṣat ca saumitreḥ śaktim agrajaḥ

original: Bhk_17.94-2 asiñcadoṣadhīs tā yāḥ samānītā hanūmatā.
analyzed: asiñcat oṣadhīḥ tāḥ yāḥ samānītāḥ hanūmatā
udajīvat sumitrābhūḥ bhrātā śliṣyata tam āyatam

original: Bhk_17.95-2 sanyaṅ mūrdhanyupāśiṅgha- dapṛcchac ca nirāmayam
analyzed: sa nyaṅ mūrdhani upāśiṅgha dapṛcchat ca nirāmayam

original: Bhk_17.96-1 tataḥ prodasahan sarve yoddhumabhyadravat parān,
analyzed: tatas prodasahan sarve yoddhum abhyadravat parān
akṛcchrāyata ca prāptaḥ rathena ā nyena rāvaṇaḥ
bhūmiṣṭhasya ā samam yuddham ratha sthena iti mātaliḥ
āharat ratham ati ugram sa śastram maghavā jñayā
saḥ dhi aṣṭhīyata rāmeṇa
śastram pāśupatam tatas
nirāsyata daśāsyaḥ
tat śakra astreṇa ajayat nṛpaḥ

original: Bhk_17.99-1 tataḥ śata-mahasreṇa rāmaḥ praurṇon niśācaram
analyzed: tatas śata mahasreṇa rāmaḥ praurṇot niśācaram
bāṇānām akṣiṇot dhuryān
sārathim ca adunot drutam
adṛśyantā nimittāni
prāhvalat kṣiti maṇḍalam
rāvaṇaḥ prāhiṇot śūlam
śaktim ca aindīm mahīpatiḥ
tābhyām anyonyam āsādya samavāpyata saṃśamaḥ

original: Bhk_17.101-2 lakṣeṇa patriṇāṃ vakṣaḥ kruddho rāmasya rākṣasaḥ
analyzed: lakṣeṇa patriṇām vakṣaḥ kruddhaḥ rāmasya rākṣasaḥ
astṛṇāt adhikam rāmaḥ tatas devata sāyakaiḥ
a klāmya drāvaṇaḥ
tasya sūtaḥ ratham anāśayat

original: Bhk_17.103-1 rākṣaso'tarjayat sūtaṃ punaś cā'ḍhaukayad ratham,
analyzed: rākṣasā utarjayat sūtam punar ca āḍhaukayat ratham
nirāsyetām ubhau bāṇān ubhau dhuryān avidhyatām
ubhau akṛntatām ketūn āvyathetām ubhau na tau
adīpyetām ubhau dhṛṣṇū
prāyuñjātām ca naipuṇam
ubhau māyām vyatāyetām
vīrau nā śrāmyatām ubhau
maṇḍalāni vicitrāṇi kṣipram ākrāmatām ubhau
na ca ubhau api alakṣyetām
yantārau āhatām ubhau
syandanau samapṛcyetām ubhayoḥ dīpta vājinau
tatas māyā mayān mūrdhnaḥ prathayat raṇe
rāmeṇa eka śatam teṣām prāvṛścyata śilīmukhaiḥ
samakṣubhnan udanvantaḥ
prākampanta mahībhṛtaḥ
santrāsam abibhar śakruḥ
praiṃkhac ca
kṣubhitā kṣitiḥ
tatas mātalinā śastram asmaryata mahīpateḥ
vadhāya rāvaṇasya ugram svayambhūḥ yat akalpayat
nabhasvān yasya vājeṣu
phale tigmāṃśu pāvakau
guru tvam meru saṅkāśam
dehaḥ sūkṣmaḥ viyat mayaḥ

original: Bhk_17.111-1 rājitaṃ gāruḍaiḥ pakṣair viśveṣāṃ ghāma tejasām
analyzed: rājitam gāruḍaiḥ pakṣaiḥ viśveṣām ghāma tejasām

original: Bhk_17.111-2 smṛtaṃ tad rāvaṇaṃ bhittvā sughoraṃ bhuvyaśāyayat.
analyzed: smṛtam tat rāvaṇam bhittvā su ghoram bhuvi aśāyayat
ābadhnan kapi vadanāni saṃprasādam
prāśaṃsat sura samitiḥ nṛpam jitā rim
anyeṣām vigata pariplavāḥ diś antāḥ
paulastyaḥ ajuṣata śucam vipanna bandhuḥ

original: Bhk_18.1-1 vyaśnute sma tataḥ śoko nābhi-sambandha-sambhavaḥ
analyzed: vyaśnute sma tatas śokaḥ na abhisambandha sambhavaḥ
vibhīṣaṇam asau uccais roditi sma daśānanam
bhūmau śete daśagrīvaḥ mahārha śayana ucitaḥ
na īkṣate vihvalam mām ca
na me vācam prayacchati
vipākaḥ uyam daśagrīva
saṃdṛṣṭaḥ na āgataḥ mayā

original: Bhk_18.3-2 tvaṃ tenā'bhihitaḥ pathyaṃ kiṃ kopaṃ na niyacchasi.
analyzed: tvam tena abhihitaḥ pathyam kim kopam na niyacchasi
bhajanti vipadaḥ tūrṇam atikrāmanti sampadaḥ

original: Bhk_18.4-2 tān, madān nā'vatiṣṭhante ye mate nyāyavādinām.
analyzed: tān madāt na avatiṣṭhante ye mate nyāya vādinām
apathyam āyatau lobhāt āmananti anujīvinaḥ
priyam śṛṇoti yaḥ tebhyaḥ
tam ṛcchanti na sampadaḥ

original: Bhk_18.6-1 prājñās tejasvinaḥ samyak paśyanti ca, vadanti ca,
analyzed: prājñāḥ tejasvinaḥ samyak paśyanti ca vadanti ca
tevajñātāḥ mahā rāja
klāmyanti viramanti ca

original: Bhk_18.7-1 leḍhi bheṣaja-van nityaṃ yaḥ pathyāni kaṭūnyapi,
analyzed: leḍhi bheṣaja vat nityam yaḥ pathyāni kaṭūni api
tad artham sevate ca ā ptān
kadācid na sa sīdati
sarvasya jāyate mānaḥ
sva hitāt ca pramādyati

original: Bhk_18.8-2 vṛddhau bhajati cā 'pathyaṃ naro yena vinaśyati.
analyzed: vṛddhau bhajati pathyam naraḥ yena vinaśyati
dveṣṭi prāyas guṇebhyaḥ yan
na ca snihyati kasyacid

original: Bhk_18.9-2 vairāyate mahadbhiś ca śīyate vṛddhimānapi.
analyzed: vairāyate mahadbhiḥ ca śīyate vṛddhimān api
samāśvasimi kena haṃ
katham prāṇimi durgataḥ

original: Bhk_18.10-2 loka-traya-patir bhrātā yasya me svapiti kṣitau
analyzed: loka traya patiḥ bhrātā yasya me svapiti kṣitau
aho jāgarti kṛcchreṣu daivam
yat balabhid jitaḥ

original: Bhk_18.11-2 luṭhyanti bhūmau klidyanti bāndhavā me svapanti ca.
analyzed: luṭhyanti bhūmau klidyanti bāndhavāḥ me svapanti ca
śivāḥ kuṣṇanti māṃsāni
bhūmiḥ pibati śoṇitam
daśagrīva sanābhīnām samadanti āmiṣam khagāḥ

original: Bhk_18.13-1 yena pūta-krator mūrdhni sthīyate sma mahā''have,
analyzed: yena pūtakratoḥ mūrdhni sthīyate sma mahā āhave

original: Bhk_18.13-2 tasyā'pīndrajito daivād dhvāṃkṣaiḥ śirasi līyate.
analyzed: tasya api indrajitaḥ daivāt dhvāṃkṣaiḥ śirasi līyate
