jihrīhi tvam tathā janāt

original: Bhk_20.27-2 mithyā māmabhisaṃkrudhya- nna-vaśāṃ śatruṇā hṛtām.
analyzed: mithyā mām abhisaṃkrudhyan na avaśām śatruṇā hṛtām
cetasaḥ tvayi vṛttiḥ me
śarīram rakṣasā hṛtam

original: Bhk_20.28-2 vidāṃkurvantu samyañco devāḥ satyamidaṃ vacaḥ
analyzed: vidāṃkurvantu samyañcaḥ devāḥ satyam idam vacaḥ

original: Bhk_20.29-1 tvaṃ punīhi punīhīti punan vāyo /
analyzed: tvam punīhi punīhi iti punan vāyo
jagatū trayam

original: Bhk_20.29-2 caran deheṣu bhūtānāṃ viddhi me buddhi-viplavam.
analyzed: caran deheṣu bhūtānām viddhi me buddhi viplavam
ti pāvanāḥ
yūyam āpaḥ
vijānīta manaḥ vṛttim śubhām mama

original: Bhk_20.31-1 jaganti dhatsva dhatsveti dadhatī tvaṃ vasundhare /
analyzed: jaganti dhatsva dhatsva iti dadhatī tvam vasundhare
avehi mama cāritram naktaṃdivam avicyutam
rasān saṃhara
dīpyasva
dhvāntam jahi
nabhaḥ bhrama
iti īhamānaḥ tigmāṃśo
vṛttam jñātum ghaṭasva me
svarge vidyasva
bhuvyāsva
bhujaṅga nilaye bhava
evam vasan mama kāśa
saṃbudhyasva kṛta akṛtam
citām kuru ca saumitre
vyasanasya sya bheṣajam
rāmaḥ tuṣyatu me vā dya
pāpām pluṣṇātu vā nalaḥ
rāghavasya matena a tha lakṣmaṇena ācitām citām

original: Bhk_20.35-2 dṛṣṭvā pradakṣiṇīkṛtya rāmaṃ pragaditā vacaḥ
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā pradakṣiṇīkṛtya rāmam pragaditāḥ vacaḥ

original: Bhk_20.36-1 pravapāṇi vapur vahnau rāsā 'haṃ śāṅkitā tvayā,
analyzed: vapuḥ vahnau rāsā ham śāṅkitā tvayā

original: Bhk_20.36-2 sarve vidantu śṛṇvantu bhavantaḥ sa plavaṅgamāḥ.
analyzed: sarve vidantu śṛṇvantu bhavantaḥ sa plavaṅgamāḥ

original: Bhk_20.37-1 māṃ duṣṭāṃ jvalita-vapuḥ pluṣāṇa vahne /
analyzed: mām duṣṭām jvalita vapuḥ pluṣāṇa vahne
saṃrakṣa kṣata malinām suhṛd yathā vā

original: Bhk_20.37-2 eṣā 'haṃ kratuṣu vasor yathā ''jya-dhārā tvāṃ prāptā vidhi-vadudīrṇa-dīpti-mālam.
analyzed: eṣā ham kratuṣu vasoḥ yathā jya dhārā tvām prāptā vidhivat udīrṇa dīpti mālam

original: Bhk_21.1-1 samutkṣipya tato vahnir maithilīṃ rāmamuktavān
analyzed: samutkṣipya tatas vahniḥ maithilīm rāmam uktavān
kākutstha
dayitām sādhvīm tvam āśaṅkiṣyathāḥ katham

original: Bhk_21.2-1 nā bhaviṣyadiyaṃ śuddhā yadyapāsyamahaṃ tataḥ
analyzed: nā bhaviṣyat iyam śuddhā yadi apāsyam aham tatas
na ca enām
pakṣapātaḥ me dharmāt anyatra rāghava

original: Bhk_21.3-1 api tatra-ripuḥ sītāṃ nā 'rthayiṣyata dur-matiḥ,
analyzed: api tatraripuḥ sītām nā arthayiṣyata durmatiḥ

original: Bhk_21.3-2 krūraṃ jātvavadiṣyac ca jātvastoṣyacchriyaṃ svakām.
analyzed: krūram jātu avadiṣyat ca jātu astoṣyat śriyam svakām

original: Bhk_21.4-1 saṅkalpaṃ nā 'kariṣyac ca tatreyaṃ śuddha-mānasā,
analyzed: saṅkalpam nā kariṣyat ca tatra iyam śuddha mānasā
satya āmarṣam avāpsyaḥ tvam rāmaḥ sītā nibandhanam

original: Bhk_21.5-1 tvayā 'drakṣyata kiṃ nā 'syāḥ śīlaṃ saṃvasatā ciram,
analyzed: tvayā drakṣyata kim nā syāḥ śīlam saṃvasatā ciram

original: Bhk_21.5-2 adarśiṣyanta vā ceṣṭāḥ kālena badhunā na kim.
analyzed: adarśiṣyanta vā ceṣṭāḥ kālena badhunā na kim
yāvajjivam aśociṣyaḥ
na ā hāsyaḥ ced idam tamaḥ
bhānuḥ api apatiṣyat kṣmām akṣobhiṣyata ced iyam
samapatsyata rāja indra
straiṇam yat yatra cāpalam

original: Bhk_21.7-2 loka-pālā ihā ''yāsyaṃs tato nā 'mī kali-druhaḥ.
analyzed: lokapālāḥ iha ā yāsyan tatas nā mī kali druhaḥ

original: Bhk_21.8-1 āścaryaṃ yacca yatra strī kṛcchre 'vartsyan mate tava,
analyzed: āścaryam yat ca yatra strī kṛcchre vartsyan mate tava

original: Bhk_21.8-2 trāsādasyāṃ vinaṣṭāyāṃ kiṃ kimālapsyathāḥ phalam.
analyzed: trāsāt asyām vinaṣṭāyām kim kim ālapsyathāḥ phalam

original: Bhk_21.9-1 yatra yaccā 'mariṣyat strī sādhvasād doṣa-varjitā
analyzed: yatra mariṣyat strī sādhvasāt doṣa varjitā

original: Bhk_21.9-2 tadasūyā-ratau loke tasyā vācyā ''spadaṃ mṛṣā.
analyzed: tad asūyā ratau loke tasyāḥ vācyā spadam mṛṣā

original: Bhk_21.10-1 amaṃtsya bhavān yadvad tathaiva ca pitā tava
analyzed: a maṃtsya bhavān yadvat tathā eva ca pitā tava

original: Bhk_21.10-2 nā ''gamiṣyad vimāna-sthaḥ sākṣād daśaratho nṛpaḥ.
analyzed: nā gamiṣyat vimāna sthaḥ sākṣāt daśarathaḥ nṛpaḥ

original: Bhk_21.11-1 nā 'kalpsyat sannidhiṃ sthānuḥ śūlī vṛṣabha-vāhanaḥ
analyzed: nā kalpsyat sannidhim sthānuḥ śūlī vṛṣabha vāhanaḥ
anvabhāviṣyatā maithilī ced pativratā
ānandayiṣyat āgamya katham tvām aravinda sat
rāja indra
viśvasūḥ dhātā cāritrye sītayā kṣate

original: Bhk_21.13-1 praṇaman brahmaṇā prokto rājakā 'dhipatis tataḥ
analyzed: praṇaman brahmaṇā proktaḥ rājakāḥ dhipatiḥ tatas
nā śotsyan maithilī loke
na acariṣyat idam yadi

original: Bhk_21.14-1 nā'mokṣyāma vayaṃ śaṅkā- mihādhāsyan na ced bhavān,
analyzed: na amokṣyāma vayam śaṅkāḥ na ced bhavān
kim vā citram idam yuktam
bhavān yat akariṣyata
prāvartiṣyanta ceṣṭāḥ ced yāthātathya vat tava

original: Bhk_21.15-2 anuśāsye tvayā loke rāmā'vartsyaṃstarāṃ tataḥ
analyzed: anuśāsye tvayā loke rāma āvartsyan tarām tatas
prāṇamantam tatas rāmam uktavān iti śaṅkaraḥ
kim nārāyaṇam ātmānam nā bhotsyata bhavān ajam

original: Bhk_21.17-1 ko nyo 'kartsyadiha prāṇān dṛptānāṃ ca sura-dviṣām,
analyzed: kaḥ kartsyat iha prāṇān dṛptānām ca suradviṣām

original: Bhk_21.17-2 ko vā viśvajanīneṣu karmasu prāghaṭiṣyata
analyzed: kaḥ vā viśvajanīneṣu karmasu prāghaṭiṣyata
daitya kṣaye mahā rāja
yat ca yatrā ghaṭiṣyathāḥ

original: Bhk_21.18-2 samāptiṃ jātu tatrāpi kiṃ nā 'neṣyas tvamīhitam.
analyzed: samāptim jātu tatra api kim nā neṣyaḥ tvam īhitam

original: Bhk_21.19-1 tātaṃ prasādya kaiyeyyā bharatāya prapīḍitam
analyzed: tātam prasādya kaiyeyyā bharatāya prapīḍitam
sahasra cakṣuṣam rāmaḥ ninaṃsuḥ paridṛṣṭavān

original: Bhk_21.20-1 pretā vareṇa śakrasya prāṇantaḥ kapayas tataḥ
analyzed: pretāḥ vareṇa śakrasya prāṇantaḥ kapayaḥ tatas
saṃjātāḥ phalināḥ namra rociṣṇu druma sadravaḥ
bhramara kulā kula ulbaṇa sugandhi puṣpa taruḥ taruṇa madhūka sambhava piśaṅgita tuṅga śikhaḥ

original: Bhk_21.21-2 śikhara-śilā 'ntarāla-parikwxlqqpta-jalā 'vasaraḥ sa-rasa-phala-śriyaṃ sa vitatāna suvela-giriḥ.
analyzed: śikhara śilā vasaraḥ sarasa phala śriyam sa vitatāna suvela giriḥ

original: Bhk_21.22-1 saṃvādbhiḥ sa-kusuma-reṇubhiḥ samīrai- rānamrair bahu-phala-dhāribhir vanā 'ntaiḥ
analyzed: saṃvādbhiḥ sa kusuma reṇubhiḥ samīraiḥ rānamraiḥ bahu phala dhāribhiḥ vana

original: Bhk_21.22-2 ścyotadbhir madhu-paṭalaiś ca vānarāṇām āpyāno ripu-vadha-sambhavaḥ pramodaḥ
analyzed: ścyotadbhiḥ madhu paṭalaiḥ ca vānarāṇām āpyānaḥ ripu vadha sambhavaḥ pramodaḥ

original: Bhk_21.23-1 āyāntyaḥ sva-phala-bhareṇa bhaṅguratvaṃ bhṛṅgā''lī-nicaya-citā latās tarūṇām
analyzed: āyāntyaḥ sva phala bhareṇa bhaṅgura tvam bhṛṅga ālī nicaya citāḥ latāḥ tarūṇām

original: Bhk_21.23-2 sā ''modāḥ kṣiti-tala-saṃsthitā'valopyā bhokt ṇāṃ ṣramamadayaṃ na nītavatyaḥ.
analyzed: sā modāḥ kṣiti tala saṃsthita avalopyāḥ na nītavatyaḥ
tatas rāmaḥ hanūmantam uktavān hṛṣṭa mānasam
ayodhyām śvas prayātāsi kape
bharata pālitām
nabhaḥ bhūyas sphuṭat megha ghaṭa āvali
īkṣitāse mbhasām patyuḥ payaḥ śiśira śīkaram
sevitāse plavaṅga
tvam mahā indra dreḥ adhityakāḥ
vyutkrānta vartmanaḥ bhānoḥ saha jyotsnā kumudvatīḥ
candana druma saṃcchannāḥ nirākṛta hima śrathāḥ

original: Bhk_22.4-2 darśitāras tvayā tāś ca malayopatyakāḥ śubhāḥ.
analyzed: darśitāraḥ tvayā tāḥ ca malaya upatyakāḥ śubhāḥ

original: Bhk_22.5-1 pratanvyaḥ komalā vindhye sahitāraḥ syadaṃ na te
analyzed: pratanvyaḥ komalāḥ vindhye sahitāraḥ syadam na te
latāḥ stabaka śālinyaḥ madhu lehi kula ākulāḥ

original: Bhk_22.6-1 draṣṭāsi prīti-mānārāt sakhibhiḥ saha sevitām
analyzed: draṣṭāsi prītimān ārāt sakhibhiḥ saha sevitām

original: Bhk_22.6-2 sa-pakṣapātaṃ kiṣkindhāṃ pūrva-krīḍāṃ smaran muhuḥ.
analyzed: sa pakṣapātam kiṣkindhām pūrva krīḍām smaran muhur
tvayā sandarśitārau te mālyavat daṇḍaka vane

original: Bhk_22.7-2 upadrutaś ciraṃ dvandvair yayoḥ kliśitavānaham.
analyzed: upadrutaḥ ciram dvandvaiḥ yayoḥ kliśitavān aham
āptārau bhavatā ramyau āśramau hariṇā kulau
puṇya udaka dvija ākīrṇau su tīkṣṇa śarabhaṅgayoḥ

original: Bhk_22.9-1 atikrāntā tvayā ramyaṃ duḥkhamatres tapo-vanam,
analyzed: atikrāntā tvayā ramyam duḥkha matreḥ tapaḥ vanam
pavitra citrakūṭe drau tvam sthātāsi kutūhalāt

original: Bhk_22.10-1 tataḥ paraṃ bharadvājo bhavatā darśitā muniḥ,
analyzed: tatas param bharadvājaḥ bhavatā darśitā muniḥ

original: Bhk_22.10-2 draṣṭāraś ca janāḥ punyā yāmunā'mbukṣatāṃ'hasaḥ.
analyzed: draṣṭāraḥ ca janāḥ punyāḥ yāmuna ambu kṣata aṃhasaḥ

original: Bhk_22.11-1 syantvā syantvā divaḥ śambhor- mūrdhni skantvā bhuvaṃ gatām
analyzed: syantvā syantvā divaḥ śambhoḥ mūrdhni skantvā bhuvam gatām

original: Bhk_22.11-2 gāhitāse 'tha puṇyasya gaṅgāṃ mūrtimiva drutām.
analyzed: gāhitāse tha puṇyasya gaṅgām mūrtim iva drutām
tamasāyāḥ mahā nīla pāṣāṇa sadṛśa tviṣaḥ
vana a ntāt bahu mantāse nāgara ākrīḍa śākhinaḥ
nagara strī stana nyasta dhauta kuṅkuma piñjarām

original: Bhk_22.13-2 vilokya sarayūṃ ramyāṃ gantā 'yodhyā tvayā purī.
analyzed: vilokya sarayūm ramyām gantā yodhyā tvayā purī

original: Bhk_22.14-1 ānanditāras tvāṃ dṛṣṭvā praṣṭāraś cāvayoḥ śivam
analyzed: ānanditāraḥ tvām dṛṣṭvā praṣṭāraḥ ca āvayoḥ śivam
mātaraḥ saha maithilyā
toṣṭā ca bharataḥ param
ākhyātāsi hatam śatrum abhiṣiktam vibhīṣaṇam
sugrīvam ca ā ṛjitam mitram
sarvān ca āgāmukān drutam

original: Bhk_22.16-1 gantāraḥ paramāṃ prītiṃ paurāḥ ṣrutvā vacas tava,
analyzed: gantāraḥ paramām prītim paurāḥ srutvā vacaḥ tava

original: Bhk_22.16-2 jñātvaitat sammukhīnaś ca sametā bharato dhruvam.
analyzed: jñātvā etat sammukhīnaḥ ca sametāḥ bharataḥ dhruvam
gate tvayi pathā nena vayam api aṃhitā āsmahe

original: Bhk_22.17-2 labdhāhe 'haṃ dhṛtiṃ prāpte bhūyo bhavati sammukhe.
analyzed: labdha ahe haṃ dhṛtim prāpte bhūyas bhavati sammukhe

original: Bhk_22.18-1 gate tasmin gṛhītā 'rthe rāmaḥ sugrīva-rākṣasau
analyzed: gate tasmin gṛhītā a rthe rāmaḥ sugrīva rākṣasau

original: Bhk_22.18-2 uktavān śvo 'bhigantāstho yuvāṃ saha mayā puram.
analyzed: uktavān śvas yuvām saha mayā puram

original: Bhk_22.19-1 draṣṭāsthas tatra tisro me māt s tuṣṭa'ntarā''tmanaḥ
analyzed: draṣṭā asthaḥ tatra tisraḥ me māt tuṣṭ antarātmanaḥ

original: Bhk_22.19-2 āntyantīnaṃ sakhi-tvaṃ ca prāptāstho bharatā ''śrayam.
analyzed: āntyantīnam sakhitvam ca prāpta āsthaḥ bharatā śrayam
nā evam viraha duḥkhena vayam vyāghānitāsmahe

original: Bhk_22.20-2 śramo nubhavitā naivaṃ bhavadbhyāṃ ca viyoga-jaḥ,
analyzed: śramaḥ nubhavitā nā evam bhavadbhyām ca viyoga jaḥ

original: Bhk_22.21-1 evaṃ yuvāṃ mama prītyai kalptāsthaḥ kapi-rākṣasau /
analyzed: evam yuvām mama prītyai kalptā āsthaḥ kapi rākṣasau

original: Bhk_22.21-2 gantuṃ prayatitāsāthe prātaḥ saha mayā yadi.
analyzed: gantum prayatitā āsāthe prātar saha mayā yadi

original: Bhk_22.22-1 utkavantau tato rāmaṃ vacaḥ paulastya-vānarau
analyzed: utkavantau tatas rāmam vacaḥ paulastya vānarau
anugrahaḥ yam kākutstha
gantāsvaḥ yat tvayā saha

original: Bhk_22.23-1 anumantāsvahe nā''vāṃ bhavantaṃ virahaṃ tvayā
analyzed: anumantāsvahe nāvām bhavantam viraham tvayā
api prāpya sura indra tvam
kim nu prattam
tvayā spadam

original: Bhk_22.24-1 tataḥ kathābhiḥ samatītya doṣā- māruhya sainyaiḥ saha puṣpakaṃ te
analyzed: tatas kathābhiḥ samatītya doṣā mā āruhya sainyaiḥ saha puṣpakam te

original: Bhk_22.24-2 samprasthitā vega-vaśāda-gādhaṃ prakṣobhayantaḥ salilaṃ payodheḥ.
analyzed: samprasthitāḥ vega vaśāt agādham prakṣobhayantaḥ salilam payodheḥ
setum mahā indram
malayam sa vindhyam
sa mālyavantam girim ṛṣyamūkam

original: Bhk_22.25-2 sa-daṇḍakā'raṇya-vātīṃ ca pampāṃ rāmaḥ priyāyāḥ kathayan jagāma.
analyzed: sa daṇḍaka araṇya vātīm ca pampām rāmaḥ priyāyāḥ kathayan jagāma
ete te muni jana maṇḍitāḥ diś antāḥ
śailoyam lulita vanaḥ sa citrakūṭaḥ
gaṅgā iyam su tanu
viśāla tīra ramyā
maithilyāḥ raghu tanayaḥ diśan nananda
śiñjāna bhramara kula ākula agra puṣpāḥ śīta ambhaḥ pravilaya saṃplavāḥ abhilīnāḥ
ete te su tano
purī jana upabhogyāḥ dṛśyante nayana manoramāḥ vanāḥ

original: Bhk_22.28-1 sthānaṃ naḥ pūrva-jānāmiyamadhikamasau preyasī pūrayodhyā,
analyzed: sthānam naḥ pūrva jānām iyam adhikam asau preyasī pūra yodhyā
dūrāt ālokyate yā huta vividha haviḥ prīṇitā śeṣadevā
saḥ yam

original: rudantaṃ pura-janamakhilaṃ yatra hitvā prayātau āvāṃ sīte /
analyzed: rudantam pura janam akhilam yatra hitvā prayātau āvām sīte
vanā ntam saha dhṛtadhṛtinā lakṣmaṇena kṣapā ante

original: Bhk_22.29-1 tūryāṇāmatha niḥsvanena sakalaṃ lokaṃ samāpūrayan vikrāntaiḥ kariṇāṃ girīndra-sadṛśāṃ kṣmāṃ kampayan sarvataḥ
analyzed: tūryāṇām atha niḥsvanena sakalam lokam samāpūrayan vikrāntaiḥ kariṇām giri indra sadṛśām kṣmām kampayan sarvatas

original: Bhk_22.29-2 sā ''nandā 'śru-vilocanaḥ prakṛtibhiḥ sārdhaṃ sahā 'ntaḥ puraḥ samprāpto bharataḥ sa-mārutiralaṃ namraḥ samaṃ mātṛbhiḥ
analyzed: sā nandā śru vilocanaḥ prakṛtibhiḥ sārdham sahā ntar puras samprāptaḥ bharataḥ sa mārutiḥ alam namraḥ samam mātṛbhiḥ
atha sa sambhrama paura janāḥ vṛtaḥ bharata pāṇi dhṛta ujjvala cāmaraḥ

original: Bhk_22.30-2 guru-jana-dvija-bandyabhinanditaḥ praviśati sma puraṃ raghu-nandanaḥ.
analyzed: guru jana dvija bandi abhinanditaḥ praviśati sma puram raghunandanaḥ

original: Bhk_22.31-1 pravidhāya dhṛtiṃ parāṃ janānāṃ yuva-rājaṃ bharataṃ tato'bhiṣicya
analyzed: pravidhāya dhṛtim parām janānām yuvarājam bharatam tatas abhiṣicya

original: Bhk_22.31-2 jaghaṭe turagā'dhvareṇa yaṣṭuṃ kṛta-sambhāra-vidhiḥ patiḥ prajānām.
analyzed: jaghaṭe turaga adhvareṇa yaṣṭum kṛta sambhāra vidhiḥ patiḥ prajānām

original: Bhk_22.32-1 idamadhigata-mukti-mārga-citraṃ vivadiṣatāṃ vadatāṃ ca san-nibandhāt
analyzed: idam adhigata mukti mārga citram vivadiṣatām vadatām ca sannibandhāt

original: Bhk_22.32-2 janayati vijayaṃ sadā janānāṃ yudhi susamāhitamaiśvaraṃ yathā 'stram.
analyzed: janayati vijayam sadā janānām yudhi su samāhitam aiśvaram yathā stram
dīpa tulyaḥ prabandhaḥ yam śabda lakṣaṇa cakṣuṣām
hastāḥ marṣaḥ bhavet vyākaraṇāt ṛte
vyākhyā gamyam idam kāvya mā utsavaḥ sudhiyām alam

original: Bhk_22.34-2 hatā dur-meghasaś cā 'smin vidvat-priya-tayā mayā.
analyzed: hatāḥ durmeghasaḥ ca smin vidvas priya tayā mayā

original: Bhk_22.35-1 kāvyamidaṃ vihitaṃ mayā valabhyāṃ śrīdharasena-nerandra-pālitāyām,
analyzed: kāvyam idam vihitam mayā valabhyām śrīdhara sena nerandra pālitāyām
kīrti rataḥ bhavatāt nṛpasya
tasya prema karaḥ kṣitipaḥ yatas prajānām
